anya-e1202n0:296_4: vaṇṇā khāyati pupphayaṭṭhiyaṃ pana nīla-pīta-lohita-odāta-kāḷavaṇṇāni pupphāni sucibhattavaṇṭa
anya-e1202n0:296_5: patta kiñjakkhā hutvā khāyanti sakuṇayaṭṭhiyaṃ haṃsakukkuṭa-jīvaṃjīvakādayo sakuṇā
anya-e1202n0:296_6: nānāppakārāni ca catuppadāni sajīvāni viya khāyanti samuddatopissa muttā-maṇi-veḷuriyādi
anya-e1202n0:297_0: Tambapaṇṇiyaṃ pana aṭṭhamuttaṃ uppajjiṃsu-bhayamuttā gajamuttā rathamuttā āmalakamuttā
anya-e1202n0:297_1: calayamuttā aṅgulīveṭhakamuttā kakudhaphalamuttā pākatikamuttāti so tā ca yaṭṭhiyo
anya-e1202n0:297_2: tā ca muttāyo aññca bahuṃ ratanaṃ asokassa dhammarañño paṇṇākāratthāya pesesi. Asokopi
anya-e1202n0:297_3: pasīditvā pañca rājakakudhabhaṇḍāniceva aññe ca abhisekatthāya bahūpaṇṇākāre pahiṇi.
anya-e1202n0:297_4: Na kevalañca etaṃ āmisa paṇṇākāraṃ, imaṃ kira dhamma paṇṇākārampi pesesi.
anya-e1202n0:302_0: Rājā avirasutaṃ sāsanapavattiṃ anussaramāno therassa taṃ “samaṇāmayaṃ mahārāja dhammarājassa
anya-e1202n0:302_1: sāvakā“ti vacanaṃ sutvā ayyā nu kho āgatāti tāvadeva āvudhaṃ nikkhipitvā ekamantaṃ
anya-e1202n0:302_2: nisīdi sammodanīyaṃ kathaṃ kathayamāno, sammodanīyakathaṃ kurumāneyeva tasmiṃ tānipi
anya-e1202n0:302_3: cattālīsa purisasahassāni āgantvā taṃ parivāresuṃ. Tadā thero itarepi jane dassesi.
anya-e1202n0:303_0: Rājā disvā ime kadā āgatāti pucchi mayā saddhiṃyeva mahā rājāti. Idāni pana jambudīpe
anya-e1202n0:303_1: añññopi evarūpā samaṇā santīti. Mahārāja etarahi jambudīpo kāsāva pajjoto isivātaparivāto, tasmiṃ-
anya-e1202n0:306_0: Atha rājā bhante sve rathaṃ pesessāmi. Taṃ abhirūhitvā āgaccheyyāthāti vatvā pakkākami
anya-e1202n0:306_1: thero acirapakkantassa rañño sumaṇasāmaṇeraṃ āmantesi ehi tvaṃ sumana dhammasavanakālaṃ
anya-e1202n0:306_2: ghosehīti sāmaṇero abhiññāpādakaṃ catutthajjhānaṃ samāpajjitvā vuṭṭhāya adhiṭṭhahitvā
anya-e1202n0:306_3: samāhitena cittena sakalatambapaṇṇidīpaṃ sācento dhammasavanakālaṃ ghosesi.
anya-e1202n0:307_0: Sāmaṇerassa saddaṃ sutvā bhummā devatā saddamanussāvesu, etenupāyena yāva brahmalokā
anya-e1202n0:307_1: saddo abbhuggañchi. Tena saddena mahādevatā sannipāto ahosi thero mahantaṃ devatā
anya-e1202n0:307_2: santipātaṃ disvā samacittasuttantaṃ kathesi. Kathā pariyosāne asaṅkheyyānaṃ devānaṃ
anya-e1202n0:307_3: dhammābhisamayo ahosi. Bahū nāga supaṇṇā ca saraṇesu patiṭṭhahiṃsu. Atha tassā rattiyā
anya-e1202n0:307_4: accayena rājā therānaṃ rathaṃ pesesi. Therā na mayaṃ rathaṃ āruhāma. Gaccha tvaṃ,
anya-e1202n0:307_5: pacchā mayaṃ āgacchissāmāti vatvā vehāsaṃ abbhuggantvā anurādhapurassa pacchimadisāya
anya-e1202n0:308_0: Rājāpi sārathiṃ pesetvā anto nivesane maṇḍapaṃ paṭiyādetvā cintesi’ nisīdissanti
anya-e1202n0:308_1: nu kho ayyā āsane na nisīdissantī“ti. Tassevaṃ cintayantasseva sārathi nagaradvāraṃ
anya-e1202n0:308_2: patvā addasa there paṭhamataraṃ āgantvā kāyabaṇdhanaṃ baṇdhitvā cīvaraṃ pārupante,
anya-e1202n0:308_3: disvā ativiya pasannamānaso hutvā āgantvā rañño ārocesi āgatā deva therāti.
anya-e1202n0:309_0: Rājā rathaṃ āruḷhāti pucchi na ārūḷhā deva, api ca pacchato nikkhamitvā paṭhamataraṃ
anya-e1202n0:309_1: āgantvā pācīnadvāre ṭhitāti. Rājā rathaṃ na ārubhiṃsūtī sutvā tena hi bhaṇe bhummattharaṇa
anya-e1202n0:309_2: saṅkhepena āsanāni paññāpethāti vatvā paṭipathā āgamāsi amaccā pathaviyaṃ taṭṭikaṃ
anya-e1202n0:309_3: paññāpetvā upari kojavakādīni vicittattharaṇāni paññāpesuṃ rājāpi gantvā there vaṇditvā
anya-e1202n0:309_4: mahiṇdattherassa hatthato pattaṃ gahetvā mahatiyā pūjāya ca sakkārena ca there paṇītena
anya-e1202n0:309_5: khādanīyena bhojanīyena sahatthā santappetvā anulādevī pamukhā pañca itthisatāni
anya-e1202n0:309_6: therānaṃ abhivādanaṃ pūjāsakkārañca kāronatūti pakkosāpetvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi. Thero
anya-e1202n0:309_8: kathesi. Taṃ sutvā tānipi pañca itthisatāni sotāpattiphalaṃ sacchikariṃsu.
anya-e1202n0:310_0: Tadā nāgarā therānaṃ guṇe sutvā there daṭṭhuṃ na labhāmāti upakkosanti atha rājā
anya-e1202n0:310_1: idha okāso natthīti cintetvā,’gacchatha bhaṇe hatthisālaṃ paṭijaggitvā vālukaṃ okiritvā
anya-e1202n0:310_2: pañcavaṇṇāni pupphāni vikiritvā vitānaṃ baṇdhitvā maṅgala hatthiṭṭhāne therānaṃ āsanāni
anya-e1202n0:311_0: Thero tattha gantvā nisīditvā devadūtasuttantaṃ kathesi kathā pariyosāne pāṇasahassaṃ
anya-e1202n0:311_1: sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhahi tathā hatthisālā sambādhāti dakkhiṇadvāre naṇdanuyyāne
anya-e1202n0:311_2: āsanaṃ paññāpesuṃ. Thero tattha nisīditvā āsivisopama suttantaṃ kathesi. Tampi sutvā
anya-e1202n0:311_3: pāṇasahassaṃ sotāpattiphalaṃ paṭilabhi evaṃ āgatadivasato dutiyadivase aḍḍhateyyānaṃ
anya-e1202n0:312_0: Therassa naṇdanavane āgatāgatāhi kulitthīhi kulasuṇhāhi kulakumārīhi saddhi samodamānasseva
anya-e1202n0:312_1: sāyaṇhasamayo jāto, thero kālaṃ sallakkhetvā gacchāmi’dāni missaka pabbatanti uṭṭhahi.
anya-e1202n0:312_2: Amaccā mahāmeghavanuyyāne there vāsesuṃ rājāpi kho tassā rattiyā accayena therassa
anya-e1202n0:312_3: samīpaṃ gantvā sukhasayitabhāvaṃ pucchitvā kappati bhante bhikkhusaṅghassa ārāmoti
anya-e1202n0:313_0: Rājā tuṭṭho suvaṇṇa bhiṃkāraṃ gahetvā therassa hatthe udakaṃ pātetvā mahāmeghavanuyyānaṃ
anya-e1202n0:313_1: adāsi thero punadivasepi rājageheyeva bhuñjitvā naṇdanavane anamataggiyāni kathesi.
anya-e1202n0:313_2: Puna divase aggikkhaṇdhopama suttantaṃ kathesi. Eteneva upāyena satta divasāni kathesi
anya-e1202n0:313_3: aḍḍha nacamānaṃ pāṇasahassānaṃ dhammābhisamayo ahosi. Sattame divase pana thero antopure
anya-e1202n0:313_4: rañño appamāda suttantaṃ kathayitvā cetiyagirimeva agamāsi.
anya-e1202n0:314_0: Atha kho rājā thero āyācito sayamevāgato, tasmā tassa anāpucchā gamanampi bhaveyyāti
anya-e1202n0:314_1: cintetvā rathaṃ abhirūhitvā, cetiyagiriṃ agamāsi mahatā rājānubhāvena gantvā therānaṃ
anya-e1202n0:314_2: santikaṃ upasaṅkamanto ativiya kilantarūpo hutvā upasaṅkami. Tato naṃ thero āha kasmā
anya-e1202n0:314_3: tvaṃ mahārāja evaṃ kilama māno āgatoti. Tumhe mama gāḷhaṃ ovādaṃ datvā idāni gantukāmā
anya-e1202n0:314_4: nukhoti jānanatthaṃ bhanteti. Na mayaṃ mahārāja gantukāmā, api ca vassupanāyika kālonamāyaṃ
anya-e1202n0:314_5: samaṇena nāma vassupanāyikaṃ ṭhānaṃ ñātuṃ vaṭṭatīti. Rājāpi kho taṃkhaṇaṃyeva karaṇḍaka
anya-e1202n0:314_6: cetiyaṅgaṇaṃ parikkhipitvā aṭṭhasaṭṭhiyā leṇesu kammaṃ paṭṭhapetvā nagarameva agamāsi.
anya-e1202n0:315_0: Tepi thero mahājanaṃ ovadamānā cetiyagirimhi vassaṃ vasiṃsu. Athāyasmā mahāmahiṇdo
anya-e1202n0:315_1: vutthavasso pavāretvā kattikapuṇṇamāyaṃ uposathadivase rājānaṃ etadavoca ciradiṭṭho
anya-e1202n0:315_2: no mahārāja sammāsambuddho abhivādana paccupaṭṭhāna añjali kamma sāmīci kamma karaṇaṭṭhānaṃ
anya-e1202n0:315_3: natthi, tenamhaṃ ukkaṇṭhitāti tanu bhante tumhe avocuttha parinibbuto sammāsambuddhoti
anya-e1202n0:315_4: kiñcāpi mahārāja parinibbuto, athassa sarīradhātuyo tiṭṭhantīti. Aññā tambhante thūpaṃ
anya-e1202n0:315_5: patiṭṭhāpemi bhūmibhāgaṃ vicinathāti. Api ca dhātuyo kuto lacchāmīti sumanena saddhiṃ
anya-e1202n0:315_6: mantehi mahārājāti rājā sumanaṃ upasaṅkamitvā pucchi’kutodāni bhantedhātuyo lacchāmā’ti
anya-e1202n0:315_7: sumano āha-appossukko tvaṃ mahārāja, vīthiyo sodhāpetvā dhaja patāka puṇṇaghaṭādīhi
anya-e1202n0:315_8: alaṅkārāpetvā saparijjano uposathaṃ samādiyitvā sabbatālāvacare upaṭṭhapetvā maṅgalahatthiṃ
anya-e1202n0:315_9: sabbālaṅkārehi patimaṇḍitaṃ kāretvā upari vassa setacchattaṃ ussāpetvā sāyaṇhasamaye
anya-e1202n0:315_10: mahānāgavanuyyānābhimukho yā hi addhā tasmiṃ ṭhāne dhātuyo lacchasiti, rājā sādhūti
anya-e1202n0:316_0: Tatrāyasmā mahiṇdatthero sumana sāmaṇeramāha- gaccha tvaṃ sāmaṇera jambudīpe ayyakaṃ
anya-e1202n0:316_1: asokadhammarājānaṃ upasaṅkamitvā mama vacanena evaṃ vadehi’sahāyo te mahārāja devānampiya
anya-e1202n0:316_2: tisso buddhasāsane pasanno thūpaṃ patiṭṭhāpetukāmo tumhākaṃ kira hatthe bhagavato
anya-e1202n0:316_3: paribhuttapatto cevadhātu ca atthi, tamme dethā’ti taṃ gahetvā sakkaṃ devarājānaṃ
anya-e1202n0:316_4: upasaṅkamitvā tumhākaṃ kira mahārāja hatthe dve dhātuyo atthi dakkhiṇadāṭhā ca dakkhiṇakkhakañca,
anya-e1202n0:316_5: tatotumhe dakkhiṇadāṭhaṃpūjetha, dakkhiṇakkhakaṃ pana mayhaṃ dethāti, evañca naṃ
anya-e1202n0:316_6: vadehi kasmā tvaṃ mahārāja amhe tambapaṇṇidīpaṃ pahiṇitvā pamajjitthāti.
anya-e1202n0:317_0: Sādhu bhanteti kho sumano therassa vacanaṃ sampaṭicchitvā tāvadeva pattacīvaramādāya
anya-e1202n0:317_1: vehāsamabbhuggantvā pāṭaliputtadvāre oruyha rañño santikaṃ gantvā tamatthaṃ ārocesi
anya-e1202n0:317_2: rājā tuṭṭho sāmaṇerassa hatthato pattaṃ gahetvā bhojetvā bhagavato pattaṃ gaṇdhehi
anya-e1202n0:318_0: So tuṃ gahetvā sakkaṃ devarājānaṃ upasaṅkami sakko devārājā sāmaṇeraṃ disvā kiṃ bhante
anya-e1202n0:318_1: sumana āhiṇḍasīti āha. Tvaṃ mahārāja amhe tambapaṇṇidīpaṃ pahiṇitvā kasmā pamajjasīti,
anya-e1202n0:318_2: tappamajjāmi bhante, vadehi kiṃ karomīti. Tumhākaṃ kira hatthe dve dhātuyo atthi
anya-e1202n0:318_3: dakkhiṇadāṭhā ca dakkhiṇakkhakañca, tato tumhe dakkhiṇadāṭhaṃ pūjetha dakkhiṇakkhakaṃ
anya-e1202n0:318_4: pana mayhaṃ dethāti. Sādhu bhanteti kho sakko devānamiṇdo yojanappamānaṃ maṇithūpaṃ
anya-e1202n0:319_0: So taṃ gahetvā cetiyagirimhiyeva patiṭṭhāsi atha kho mahiṇdapamukhā sabbe te mahānāgā
anya-e1202n0:319_1: asokadhammarājena dinna dhātuyo cetiyagiriyamhiyeva patiṭṭhāpetvā dakkhiṇakkhakaṃ
anya-e1202n0:319_2: ādāya vaḍḍhamānakacchāyāya mahānāga vanuyyānamagamaṃsu. Rājāpi kho sumanena vuttappakāraṃ
anya-e1202n0:319_3: pūjāsakkāraṃ katvā hatthikkhaṇdhavaragato sāyaṃ maṅgalahatthimatthake setacchattaṃ
anya-e1202n0:320_0: Athassa etadahosi- sace ayaṃ sammāsambuddhassa dhātu, chattaṃ apanamatu, maṅgalahatthi
anya-e1202n0:320_1: jaṇṇukehi bhūmiyaṃ patiṭṭhāhatu, dhātu caṅgoṭakaṃ mayhaṃ matthake patiṭṭhahatūti
anya-e1202n0:320_2: saha rañño cittuppādena chattaṃ apanami hatthijaṇṇukehi patiṭṭhahi dhātucaṅgoṭakaṃ
anya-e1202n0:320_3: rañño matthake patiṭṭhahi rājā amatenevābhisittagatto paramena pītipāmojjena samannāgato
anya-e1202n0:320_4: hutvā pucchi dhātuṃ bhante kiṃ karomīti. Hatthikumbhiyeva tāva mahārāja ṭhapehīti.
anya-e1202n0:320_5: Rājā dhātuvaṅgoṭakaṃ hatthikumbhe ṭhapesi. Pamudito nāgo kuñcanādaṃ nadi mahāmegho
anya-e1202n0:320_6: uṭṭhahitvā pokkharavassaṃ vasisi ukadapariyantaṃ katvā mahābhūmicālo ahosi paccantepi
anya-e1202n0:321_0: Atha so hatthināgo aneka tālāvacaraparivuto ativiya uḷārena pūjāsakkārena sakkariyamāno
anya-e1202n0:321_1: pacchimadisābhimukho hutvā apasakkanto yāva nagarassa puratthima dvāraṃ tāva gantvā
anya-e1202n0:321_2: puratthimena dvārena nagaraṃ pavisitvā sakalanagare uḷārāya pūjāya kayirāmānāya dakkhiṇadvārena
anya-e1202n0:321_3: nikkhamitvā thūpārāmassa pacchimadisābhāge pabhejavatthu nāma kira atthi tattha gantvā
anya-e1202n0:321_4: puna thūpārāmābhimukho eva paṭinivatti. So ca purimakānaṃ tiṇṇaṃ sammāsambuddhānaṃ
anya-e1202n0:321_5: dhammakarakaṃ kāyabaṇdhanaṃ udakasāṭīkaṃ patiṭṭhāpetvā katacetiyaṭṭhānaṃ hotī. Tadetaṃ
anya-e1202n0:321_6: vinaṭṭhesupi cetiyesu devatānubhāvena kaṇṭaka samākiṇṇasākhāhi nānāgacchehi parivutaṃ
anya-e1202n0:321_7: tiṭṭhati. Mā naṃ koci ucciṭṭhā suvimala kacavarehi saṇdusesīti.
anya-e1202n0:322_0: Atha tassa hatthino purato gantvā rājapurisā sabba gacche chiṇditvā bhūmiṃ sodhetvā
anya-e1202n0:322_1: taṃ hatthatalasadisaṃ akaṃsu. Hatthināgo gantvā taṃ ṭhānaṃ purato katvā tassa pacchimadisābhāge
anya-e1202n0:322_2: bodhirukkhaṭṭhane aṭṭhāsi. Athassa matthakato dhātuṃ oropetuṃ ārabhiṃsu nāgo oropetuṃ
anya-e1202n0:322_3: na deti. Theraṃ pucchi, kasmā bhante nāgo dhātuṃ oropetuṃ na detīti
anya-e1202n0:323_0: Āruḷhaṃ mahārāja oropetuṃ na vaṭṭatiti. Tasmiñca kāle abhayavāpiyā udakaṃ jinnaṃ
anya-e1202n0:323_1: hoti samantā bhūmi phalitā suuddharā mattikapiṇḍā. Tato mahājano sīghasīghaṃ mattikaṃ
anya-e1202n0:323_2: āharitvā hatthakumbhappamāṇaṃ vatthumakāsi. Tāvadeva thūpakaraṇatthaṃ iṭṭhikā kātuṃ
anya-e1202n0:323_3: ārabhiṃsu. Yāva iṭṭhikā pariniṭṭhanti tāva hatthināgo katipāhaṃ divā bodhirukkhaṭṭhāne
anya-e1202n0:323_4: hatthisālāyaṃ tiṭṭhati. Rattiyaṃ thūpapatiṭṭhāna bhūmiyaṃ pariyāyati.
anya-e1202n0:324_0: Atha vatthuṃ vināpetvā rājā theraṃ pucchi, kīdiso bhante thūpo kātabboti. Vīhirāsi
anya-e1202n0:324_1: sadiso mahārājāti, sādhu bhanteti rājā jaṅghappamāṇaṃ thūpaṃ cināpetvā dhātuoropanatthāya
anya-e1202n0:325_0: Tato sakalanāgarā ca jānapadā ca dhātumha dassanatthaṃ santipatiṃsu sannipatite ca
anya-e1202n0:325_1: tasmiṃ mahājane dasabalassa dhātu hatthikumbhato sattatālappamānaṃ vehāsamabbhuggantvā
anya-e1202n0:325_2: yamakapāṭihāriyaṃ dassesi. Tehi tehi dhātuppadesehi chabbaṇṇaraṃsiyo udakadharā ca
anya-e1202n0:325_3: aggikkhaṇdhā ca pavattanti. Sāvatthiyaṃ gaṇḍambamūle bhagavatā dassita pāṭihāriya
anya-e1202n0:325_4: sadisaṃ eva pāṭihāriyaṃ ahosi. Tañca kho neva therānubhāvenana devatānubhāvena, api
anya-e1202n0:325_5: ca kho buddhānaṃyeva ānubhāvena bhagavā kira dharamānova adhiṭṭhāsi - tambapaṇṇidīpe
anya-e1202n0:325_6: anurādhapurassa dakkhiṇadisābhāge purimakānaṃ tiṇṇaṃ buddhānaṃ cetiyaṭṭhāne mama
anya-e1202n0:328_0: Dhātusarīrato nikkhanta udakaphusitehi sakalehi tambapaṇṇidīpatale na koci aphuṭṭhokāso
anya-e1202n0:328_1: nāma ahosi. Evamassa taṃ dhātu sarīraṃ udakaphusitehi tambapaṇṇitthalassa paridāhaṃ
anya-e1202n0:328_2: vūpasametvā mahājanassa pāṭihāriyaṃ dassetvā otaritvā rañño matthake patiṭṭhāsi rājā
anya-e1202n0:328_3: saphalaṃ manussattapaṭilābhaṃ maññamāno mahantaṃ sakkāraṃ katvā dhātuṃ patiṭṭhāpesi.
anya-e1202n0:328_4: Saha dhātupatiṭṭhānena mahābhūmicālo ahosi niṭṭhite pana thūpe rājā ca rājā bhātikā
anya-e1202n0:328_5: ca deviyo ca de-nāga-yakkhānaṃ vimbhayakaraṃ paccekaṃ thūpamakaṃsu.
anya-e1202n0:333: Sādhujana manopasādanatthāya kate thūpavaṃse thūpārāma kathā,
anya-e1202n0:334_0: 13. Niṭṭhitāya pana dhātupūjāya patiṭṭhite dhātuvare mahiṇdatthero mahāmeghavanuyyānameva
anya-e1202n0:334_1: gantvāvāsaṃ kappesi. Tasmiṃ kho pana samaye anulādevī pabbajitukāmā hutvā rañño ārocesi.
anya-e1202n0:334_2: Rājā tassā vacanaṃ sutvā theraṃ etadavoca? Bhante anulādevī pabbajitukāmā, pabbājetha
anya-e1202n0:334_3: nanta na mahārāja amhākaṃ mātugāmaṃ pabbājetuṃ kappati. Pāṭaliputte pana mayhaṃ bhagini
anya-e1202n0:334_4: saṅghamittā therī nāma atthi, taṃ pakkosāpehi mahārāja, imasmiñca dīpe purimakānañca
anya-e1202n0:334_5: tiṇṇaṃ sammāsambuddhānaṃ bodhi patiṭṭhaṃsi amhākampi bhagavato sarasa raṃsijāla vissajjanakena
anya-e1202n0:334_6: bodhinā patiṭṭhātabbaṃ, tasmā sāsanaṃ pahiṇeyyasi yathā saṅghamittā bodhiṃ gahetvā āgaccheyyāti.
anya-e1202n0:335_0: Rājā therassa vacanaṃ sampaṭicchitvā amaccehi saddhiṃ mantento ariṭṭhaṃ nāma attano
anya-e1202n0:335_1: bhāgineyyaṃ āha sakkhissasi tvaṃ tāta pāṭalīputtaṃ gantvā mahābodhinā saddhiṃ ayyaṃ
anya-e1202n0:335_2: saṅghamittattheriṃ ānetunti sakkhissāmi deva sace me pabbajjaṃ anujānissasīti.
anya-e1202n0:336_0: Gaccha tāta theriṃ ānetvā pabbajjāhīti. So rañño ca therissa ca sāsanaṃ gahetvā therassa
anya-e1202n0:336_1: adhiṭṭhānavasena ekadivase na jambukolapaṭṭanaṃ gantvā nāvaṃ abhirūhitva samuddaṃ
anya-e1202n0:336_2: atikkamitvā pāṭalīputtaṃ gantvā rañño sāsanaṃ ācikkhi-putto te deva mahiṇdathero
anya-e1202n0:336_3: evamāha. Sahāyassa kira te devānampiyatissassa bhātujāyā anulādevī nāma pabbajitukāmā,
anya-e1202n0:336_4: taṃ pabbājetuṃ ayyaṃ saṅghamittattheriṃ pahiṇeyyātha, ayyāya eva ca saddhiṃ mahābodhinti.
anya-e1202n0:337_0: Therassa sāsanaṃ ārocetvā saṅghamittattheriṃ upasaṅkamitvā evamāha. Ayye tumhākaṃ
anya-e1202n0:337_1: bhātā mahiṇdatthero maṃ tumhākaṃ santikaṃ pesesi devānampiyatissa rañño bhātujāyā
anya-e1202n0:337_2: anulādevī nāma pañcahi kaññāsatehi pañcahi ca antepurisā satehi saddhiṃ pabbajitukāmāti,
anya-e1202n0:338: Sā tāva deva turita turitā gantvā raññā tैmatthaṃ ārocetvā gacchāmahaṃ mahārāja tambapaṇṇidīpanti āha.
anya-e1202n0:339_0: Tena hi amma mahābodhiṃ gahetvā gacchāhīti vatvā pāṭalīputtato yāva mahābodhi tāva
anya-e1202n0:339_1: maggaṃ paṭijaggāpetvā sattayojanāyāmaya tiyojana vitthatāya mahatiyā senāya pāṭaliputtato
anya-e1202n0:340_0: Senāya samussita dhajapatākaṃ nānāratana vicittaṃ anekālaṅkāra patimaṇḍitaṃ nānāvidha
anya-e1202n0:340_1: kusuma samākiṇṇaṃ aneka turiya saṃghraṭṭhaṃ mahābodhiṃ parikkhipi tato rājā puppha-gaṇdha-mālādīhi
anya-e1202n0:340_2: pūjetvā tikkhattuṃ padakkhiṇaṃ katvā aṭṭhasu ṭhānesu vaṇditvā uṭṭhāya añjalimpaggayha
anya-e1202n0:340_3: ṭhatvā saccavacanakiriyāya bodhiṃ gaṇhitukāmo ratanapīṭhaṃ āruyha tulikaṃ gahetvā
anya-e1202n0:340_4: manosilāya lekhaṃ katvā yadi mahābodhinā laṅkādīpe patiṭṭhātabbaṃ, yadi cāhaṃ buddhasāsane
anya-e1202n0:340_5: nibbematiko bhaveyyaṃ, mahābodhi sayameva imasmiṃ suvaṇṇakaṭāhe patiṭṭhahatūti saccakiriyamakāsi
anya-e1202n0:340_6: saha saccakiriyāya bodhisākhā manosilāya paricchinnaṭṭhānehi chiṇditvā gaṇdha kalala
anya-e1202n0:341_0: Tato rājā mahābodhiṃ bodhimaṇḍato mahantena sakkārena pāṭalīputtaṃ ānetvā sabbaparihārāni
anya-e1202n0:341_1: datvā mahābodhiṃ gaṅgāya nāvaṃ āropetvā sayampi nagarato nikkhamitvā viñjhāṭaviṃ
anya-e1202n0:341_2: samatikkamma anupubbena sattadivasehi tāmalittiṃ anuppatto antaramagge deva-nāga-manussā
anya-e1202n0:342_0: Rājāpi samuddatīre sattadivasāni mahābodhiṃ ṭhapetvā mahantaṃ sakkāraṃ katvā bodhimpi
anya-e1202n0:342_1: saṃṅghamittattherimpi saparivāraṃ nāvaṃ āropetvā gacchati vatare dasabalassa sarasa
anya-e1202n0:342_2: raṃsijālā muñcamāno mahābodhi rukkhoti kaṇditvā añjalimpaggahetvā assūni pavattayamāno
anya-e1202n0:342_3: aṭṭhāsi sāpi kho mahābodhi samarūḷhanāvā passato passato mahārājassa mahāsamuddatalaṃ
anya-e1202n0:342_4: pakkhaṇdi mahāsamuddepi samantā yojanaṃ vīci vūpasantā pañcavaṇṇāni padumāni pupphitāni
anya-e1202n0:342_5: antalikkhe dibbaturiyāni vajjiṃsu ākāse jala thala sannissitāhi devatāhi pavattitā
anya-e1202n0:342_6: ativiya uḷāra pūjā ahosi. Evaṃ mahatiyā pūjāya sā nāvā jambukolapaṭṭanaṃ pāvisi.
anya-e1202n0:343_0: Devānampiyatissa mahārājāpi uttaradvārato paṭṭhāya yāva jambukolapaṭṭanā maggaṃ sodhāpetvā
anya-e1202n0:343_1: alaṅkārāpetvā nagarato nikkhamana divase uttaradvāra samīpe saddasālāvatthusmiṃ ṭhito
anya-e1202n0:343_2: tāya vibhūtiyā mahāsamudde āgacchantaṃyeva mahābodhiṃ therassānubhāvena disvā tuṭṭhamānaso
anya-e1202n0:343_3: nikkhamitvā sabbaṃ maggaṃ pañcavaṇṇehi pupphehi okiranto antarantarā pupphaagghiyāni
anya-e1202n0:343_4: ṭhapento ekāheneva jambukolapaṭṭanaṃ gantvā sabbatālāvacara parivuto puppha dhūpagaṇdhādīhi
anya-e1202n0:343_5: pūjayamāno galappamaṃnaṃ udakaṃ oruyha āgato vata redasabalassa sarasa raṃsijālaṃ
anya-e1202n0:343_6: vissajjanako bodhirukkhoti pasannacitto mahābodhiṃ ukkhipitvā uttamaṅge sirasmiṃ
anya-e1202n0:343_7: patiṭṭhapetvā mahābodhiṃ parivāretvā āgatehi soḷasahi jātisampannakulehi saddhiṃ
anya-e1202n0:343_8: samuddato paccuttaritvā samuddatīre bodhiṃ ṭhapetvā tīṇi divasāni sakala tambapaṇṇi rajjena pūjesi.
anya-e1202n0:344_0: Atha catutthe divase mahābodhiṃ ādāya uḷāraṃ pūjaṃ kurumāno anupubbena anurādhapuraṃ
anya-e1202n0:344_1: sampatte anurādhapurepi mahāsakkāraṃ katvā cātuddasī divase vaḍḍhamānakacchāyāya
anya-e1202n0:344_2: mahābodhiṃ uttaradvārena pavesetvā nagaramajjhana atiharitvā dakkhiṇadvārena nikkhamitvā
anya-e1202n0:344_3: dakkhiṇadvārato pañcadhanu satike ṭhāne yattha amhākaṃ sammāsambuddho nirodha samāpattiṃ
anya-e1202n0:344_4: samāpajjitvā nisīdi. Purimakā ca tayo sammāsambuddhā samāpattiṃ appetvā nisīdiṃsu.
anya-e1202n0:344_5: Yattha ca kakusaṇdhassa bhagavato sirīsabodhi, konāgamanassa bhagavato udumbarabodhi,
anya-e1202n0:344_6: kassapassa bhagavato nigrodhabodhi, patiṭṭhāpesi -tasmiṃ mahāmeghavanuyyānassa tilakabhūte
anya-e1202n0:348_0: 14. Anulādevī pañcahi kaññāsatehi pañcahi antepurisā satehīti mātugāmasahassena saddhiṃ
anya-e1202n0:348_1: saṅghamittattheriyā santike pabbajitvā nacirasseva saparivārā arahatte patiṭṭhāsi.
anya-e1202n0:348_2: Ariṭṭhopi kho rañño bhāgineyyo pañcahi purisa satehi saddhiṃ therassa santike pabbajitvā
anya-e1202n0:348_3: saparivāro nacirasseva arahatte patiṭṭhāsi. Athekadivasaṃ rājā bodhiṃ vaṇditvā therena
anya-e1202n0:348_4: saddhiṃ thūpārāmaṃ gacchati. Tassa lohapāsādaṭṭhānaṃ sampattassa purisā pupphāni
anya-e1202n0:348_5: āhariṃsu rājā therassa pupphāni adāsi. Thero pupphehi lohapāsādaṭṭhānaṃ pūjesi pupphesu
anya-e1202n0:349_0: Rājā kasmā bhante bhūmi calitāni pucchi. Imasmiṃ mahārāja okāse anāgate saṅghassa
anya-e1202n0:349_1: uposathāgāraṃ bhavissati. Tassetaṃ pubbanimittanti āha. Puna tassa mahācetiyaṭṭhānaṃ
anya-e1202n0:349_2: sampattassa campaka pupphāni abhihariṃsu. Tānipi rājā therassa adāsi. Thero mahācetiyaṭṭhānaṃ
anya-e1202n0:349_3: pupphehi pūjetvā vaṇdi tāvadeva mahāpathavī saṃkampi. Rājā bhante kasmā pathavī kampitthāti
anya-e1202n0:349_4: pucchi. Mahārāja imasmiṃ ṭhāne anāgate buddhassa bhagavato asadiso mahāthūpo bhavissati.
anya-e1202n0:349_5: Tassetaṃ pubbanimittanti āha. Ahameva karomi bhanteti. Alaṃ mahārāja tumhākaṃ aññaṃ
anya-e1202n0:349_6: bahuṃ kammaṃ atthi. Tumhākaṃ pana nantā duṭṭhagāmaṇī abhayo nāma kāressatīti.
anya-e1202n0:350_0: Atha rājā sace bhante mayhaṃ nantā karissati. Kataṃyeva mayāti dvādasahatthaṃ pāsāṇatthamhaṃ
anya-e1202n0:350_1: āharāpetvā devānampiyatissa rañño nattā duṭṭhagāmaṇi abhayo nāma imasmiṃ padese thūpaṃ
anya-e1202n0:350_2: karotīti akkharāni likhāpetvā patiṭṭhāpesīti atha devānampiyatissarājā cetiyapappate
anya-e1202n0:350_3: nihitā sammāsambuddha bhutta patta pūretvā āhaṭā dhātuyohatthikkhaṇdhena āharāpetvā
anya-e1202n0:350_4: sakalatambapaṇṇidīpe yojane yojane thūpaṃ kāretvā dhātuyo patiṭṭhāpesi bhagavato
anya-e1202n0:350_5: pattaṃ pana rāja geheyava ṭhapetvā pūjamakāsīti.
anya-e1202n0:354_0: Atha rājā aññāni ca bahūni puññakammāni katvā cattālīsa vassāni rajjaṃ kāresi. Tassa
anya-e1202n0:354_1: accayena taṃ kaniṭṭho uttiya rājā dasavassāni rajjaṃ kāresi. Tassa accayena taṃ kaniṭṭho
anya-e1202n0:354_2: mahāsīvo dasavassāneva rajjaṃ kāresi tassa accayena tassāpi kaniṭṭho sūratisso dasavassāneva
anya-e1202n0:354_3: rajjaṃ kāresi tato assanāvika puttā dve damiḷā sūratissaṃ gahetvā dvevīsa vassāni
anya-e1202n0:354_4: dhammena rajjaṃ kāresuṃ. Te gahetvā muṭasīvassa rañño putto aselo nāma dasavassāni
anya-e1202n0:354_5: rajjaṃ kāresi atha coḷaraṭṭhato agantvā eḷāro nāma damilo asela bhūpatiṃ gahetvā
anya-e1202n0:354_6: catucattālīsa vassāni rajjaṃ kāresi eḷāraṃ gahetvā duṭṭhagāmaṇi abhayo rājā ahosi.
anya-e1202n0:356_0: 15. Devānampiyatissa rañño kira dutiyabhātiko uparājā mahānāgo nāma ahosi. Atha rañño
anya-e1202n0:356_1: devī attano puttassa rajjaṃ icchanti taracchanāvā vāpiṃ karontassa uparājassavisena
anya-e1202n0:356_2: ambaṃ yojetvā ambamatthake ṭhapetvā pesesi deviyi putte, uparājena saddhiṃ gato bhājane
anya-e1202n0:356_3: vivaṭe sayameva amabaṃ gahetvā khāditvā kālamakāsi uparājā taṃ kāraṇaṃ ñatvā deviyā
anya-e1202n0:356_4: bhīto tatoyeva attano deviñca balavāhanañca gahetvā rohaṇaṃ agamāsi. Tassa aggamahesi
anya-e1202n0:356_5: antarāmagge yaṭṭālavihāre nāma puttaṃ vijāyi tassa tissoti bhātunāma’makaṃsi.
anya-e1202n0:357_0: So tato gantvā mahāgāme vasanto rohaṇe rajjaṃ kāresi tassa accayena tassa putto yaṭṭālatisso
anya-e1202n0:357_1: mahāgāmeyeva rajjaṃ kāresi. Tassa accayena tassāpi putto goṭhābhayo nāma tattheva
anya-e1202n0:357_2: rajjaṃ kāresi. Goṭhābhayassa putto kākavaṇṇatisso nāma tattheva rajjaṃ kāresi. Kākavaṇṇatissa
anya-e1202n0:357_3: rañño kira kalyāṇitissa rañño dhītā vihāramahādevī nāma aggamahesi ahosi sā rañño
anya-e1202n0:357_4: piyā ahosi manāpā. Rājā tāya saddhiṃ samaggavāsaṃ vasanto puññāni karonto vihāsi.
anya-e1202n0:357_5: Athekadivasaṃ devī rājageheyeva bhikkhusaṅghassa mahādānaṃ datvā sāyaṇhasamaye gaṇdhamālādīni
anya-e1202n0:357_6: gāhāpetvā dhammaṃ sotuṃ vihāraṃgatā, tattha nipannaṃ bāḷhagilānaṃ āsannamaraṇaṃ sīlavantaṃ
anya-e1202n0:357_7: sāmaṇeraṃ disvā gaṇdhamālādīhi pūjetvā attano sampattiṃ vaṇṇetvā mama puttabhāvaṃ
anya-e1202n0:358_0: So na icchi, yāpi punappuna yāciyeva. Sāmaṇeropi evaṃ sante sāsanānuggahaṃ kātuṃ
anya-e1202n0:358_1: sakkātisampaṭicchitvā gatinimittavasena upaṭṭhitampi devalokaṃ chaḍḍetvā nikantivasena
anya-e1202n0:358_2: suvaṇṇa sivikāya gacchantiyā deviyā kucchimhi paṭisaṇdhiṃ gaṇhi.
anya-e1202n0:359_0: Sā dasamāsaccayena puttaṃ vijāyi. Tassa gāmaṇi abhayoti nāmaṃ kariṃsu. Aparabhāge
anya-e1202n0:359_1: aparampi tassa tissoti nāmaṃ kariṃsu. Gāmaṇi kumāro kamena vaḍḍhento soḷasa vassiko
anya-e1202n0:359_2: hutvā hatthassa tharā sippesu kovido tejobala parakkama sampanno ahosi. Atha kho
anya-e1202n0:360_0: Tesaṃ uppattikathā mahāvaṃsato gahetabbā rājā dasamahāyodhānaṃ puttassa sakkārasamaṃsakkāraṃ
anya-e1202n0:360_1: kāresi tissakumāraṃ janapada rakkhanatthāya dīghavāpiyaṃ ṭhapesi athekadivasaṃ gāmiṇī
anya-e1202n0:360_2: kumāro attano balavāhana sampattiṃ disvā damiḷehi saddhiṃ yujjhassāmīti rañño kathāpesi.
anya-e1202n0:360_3: Rājā puttaṃ anurakkhanto alaṃ oragaṅganti nivāresi. So yāva tatiyaṃ kathāpesi rājā
anya-e1202n0:360_4: kujjhitvā hemasaṅkhalikaṃ karotha baṇdhitvā rakkhissāmīti. Abhayo pitu rañño kujjhitvā
anya-e1202n0:360_5: palāyitvā malayaṃ agamāsi tato paṭṭhāya pitari duṭṭhattā duṭṭhagāmaṇīti paññāto rājā
anya-e1202n0:360_6: puttānaṃ kalahaṭṭhānaṃ āgamanatthāya yodhehi sapathaṃ kāresi.
anya-e1202n0:361_0: Atha kākavaṇṇatissa rājā catusaṭṭhivihāre kāretvā catusaṭṭhi saṃvaccharāneva ṭhatvā
anya-e1202n0:361_1: kālamakāsi tissakumāro pitukālakatabhāvaṃ sutvā dīghavāpito āgantvā pitu sarīrakiccaṃ
anya-e1202n0:361_2: kāretvā mātaraṃ - kaṇḍula hatthiñca gahetvā bhātu bhayā dīghavāpiṃ agamāsi. Amaccā
anya-e1202n0:361_3: sannipatitvā taṃ pavattiṃ vatvā duṭṭhagāmaṇitissa santikaṃ pesesuṃ. So taṃ sāsanaṃ
anya-e1202n0:361_4: sutvā bhuttasālaṃ āgamma bhātu santikaṃ dūte pesetvā tato mahāgāmaṃ āgantvā abhisekaṃ
anya-e1202n0:361_5: patvā mātaraṃ kaṇḍulahatthiñca pesetūti yāva tatiyaṃ bhātu santikaṃ lekhā pesetvā
anya-e1202n0:361_6: apesana bhāvaṃ ñatvā yuddhāya nikkhami. Kumāropi yuddhasajjohutvānikkhami. Cuḷaṅgaṇiya
anya-e1202n0:362_0: Te kira yodhā sapathassa katattā tesaṃ yuddhe sahāyā na bhaviṃsu. Tadā rañño anekasahassa
anya-e1202n0:362_1: manussā mariṃsu. Rājā parajjitvā tissāmaccaṃ dighatuṇikaṃ vaḷavañca gahetvā palāyi.
anya-e1202n0:362_2: Kumāro pacchato pacchato anubaṇdhi. Antare bhikkhu pabbataṃ māpesuṃ. Taṃ disvā kumāro
anya-e1202n0:362_3: bhikkhusaṅghassa kammanti ñatvā nivatti rājā palāyitvā kappaṇdakara nadiyā jalamālatitthaṃ
anya-e1202n0:362_4: nāma gantvaṃ chātomhiti āha. Amacco suvaṇṇasarake pakkhittabhattā niharitvā adāsi.
anya-e1202n0:363_0: Rājā kālaṃ sallakkhetvā saṅghassa datvā bhuñjāmiti saṅghassa-amaccassa-vaḷavāya-attano
anya-e1202n0:363_1: cāti catubhāgaṃ katvā kālā ghosāpesi tadā piyaṅgudipato kuṭumbiyatissatthero nāma
anya-e1202n0:363_2: āgantvā purato aṭṭhāsi. Rājā theraṃ disvā pasannamānaso saṅghassa ṭhapitabhāgaṃ attano
anya-e1202n0:363_3: bhāgañca therassa patte pakkhipiṃ amaccopi attano bhāgaṃ pakkhipi vaḷavāpi dātukāmā
anya-e1202n0:363_4: ahosi. Tassābhippāyaṃ ñatvā amacco tassāpi bhāgaṃ patte pakkhipi.
anya-e1202n0:364_0: Iti so rājā therassa paripuṇṇa bhattapattaṃ adāsi. Thero pattaṃ gahetvā gantvā gotamattherassa
anya-e1202n0:364_1: nāma adāsi. So pañcasata bhikkhu bhojetvā puna tato laddhehi bhāgehi pattapūretvā
anya-e1202n0:364_2: ākāse khipi patto gantvā rañño purato aṭṭhāsi tisso pattaṃ gahetvā rājānaṃ bhojetvā
anya-e1202n0:364_3: tato sayaṃ bhuñjitvā vaḷavaṃ bhojesi. Tato rājā sannāhaṃ cumbaṭakaṃ katvā pattaṃ
anya-e1202n0:364_4: vissajjesi. Tato gantvā therassa hatthe patiṭṭhāsi, rājā puna mahāgāmaṃ āgantvā senaṃ
anya-e1202n0:364_5: saṅkaḍḍivo saṭṭhisahassabalā gahetvā puna bhātarā saddhiṃ yujjhi tadā kumārassa aneka
anya-e1202n0:365: Kumāro palāyitvā vihāraṃ pavisitvā mahātherassa gehaṃ pāvisi.
anya-e1202n0:366_0: Rājā pacchato pacchato anubaṇdhanto vihāraṃ paviṭṭhabhāvaṃ ñatvā nivatti pacchā therā
anya-e1202n0:366_1: te ubho bhātaro aññamaññaṃ khamāpesuṃ. Tadā rājā sassakammāni kāretuṃ tissakumāraṃ
anya-e1202n0:366_2: dīghavāpimeva pahiṇitvā sayampi bheraṃ carāpetvā sassakammāni kāresi. Atha mahājanassa
anya-e1202n0:366_3: saṅgahaṃkatvā kunte dhātuṃ nidhāpetvā balavāhana parivuto tissārāmaṃ gantvā saṅghaṃ
anya-e1202n0:366_4: vaṇditvā bhante sāsanaṃ jotetuṃ pāragaṅgaṃ gamissāmi sakkāretuṃ amhehi sahagāmino
anya-e1202n0:367_0: Saṅgho pañcasatabhikkhu adāsi. Rājā bhikkhusaṅghaṃ gahetvā kaṇḍulahatthimāruyha yodhehi
anya-e1202n0:367_1: parivuto mahatā balakāyena yuddhāya nikkhamitvā mahiyaṅgaṇaṃ āganantvā tattha damiḷehi
anya-e1202n0:367_2: saddhiṃ yujjhanto mahiyaṅgaṇe kañcuka thūpaṃ kāresi. Tassa thūpassa vibhāvanatthaṃ ayamānupubbakathā.
anya-e1202n0:368_0: 16. Bhagavā kira bodhite navame māse imaṃ dīpamāgantvā gaṅgātīre tiyojanāyate yojanavitthate
anya-e1202n0:368_1: mahānāgavanuyyāne yakkhasamāgamaṃ āgantvā tesaṃ yakkhānaṃ uparibhāge mahiyaṅgaṇa
anya-e1202n0:368_2: thūpassa ṭhāne vehāsayaṃ ṭhito vuṭṭhi vātaṇdhakārādīhi yakkhe santāsetvā tehi abhayaṃ
anya-e1202n0:368_3: yācito tumhākaṃ abhayaṃ dassāmi tumhe samaggā mayhaṃ nisīdanaṭṭhānaṃ dethāti āha.
anya-e1202n0:369_0: Yakkhā, mārisa te imaṃ sakaladīpaṃ demi. Abhayaṃ no dehīti āhaṃsu. Tato bhagavā tesaṃ
anya-e1202n0:369_1: bhayaṃ apanuditvā tehi dinnabhabhūmiyaṃ cammakhaṇḍaṃ pattharitvā tattha nisinno tejokasiṇaṃ
anya-e1202n0:369_2: samāpajjitvā cammakhaṇḍaṃ samantato jāletvā vaḍḍhesi. Te cammakhaṇḍena abhibhūnā
anya-e1202n0:369_3: samantato sāgara pariyante rāsibhūtā ahesuṃ bhagavā iddhibalena giridīpaṃ nāma idhānetvā
anya-e1202n0:369_4: tattha yakkhe pavesetvā dīpaṃ yathāṭṭhāne ṭhapetvā cammakhaṇḍaṃ saṅkhipi tadā devatā
anya-e1202n0:369_5: samāgamo ahosi. Tasmiṃ samāgame bhagavā dhammaṃ desesi-tadā.
anya-e1202n0:375: Pāṇimatte adā kese tassa pāṇihito jino;
anya-e1202n0:376: So taṃ suvaṇṇicaṅgoṭaṃ-carenādāya satthuno, nisinnaṭṭhāna racite-nānāratanasañcaye.
anya-e1202n0:379_0: Parinibbute pana bhagavati dhammasenāpati sāri puttattherassa antevāsiko sarabhū
anya-e1202n0:379_1: nāmeko thero citakato gīvaṭṭhidhātu gahetvā bhikkhu saṅghaparivuto āgantvā tasmiṃyeva
anya-e1202n0:379_2: cetiye patiṭṭhāpetvā meghavaṇṇapāsāṇehi chādetvā dvādasa hatthubbedhaṃ thūpaṃ kāretvā
anya-e1202n0:379_3: pakkāmi. Atha devānampiyatissa rañño bhātā cūḷābhayo nāma taṃ abbhutaṃ cetiyaṃ disvā
anya-e1202n0:379_4: tiṃsahatthubbedhaṃ cetiyaṃ kāresi. Idāni duṭṭhagāmaṇīpi abhayarājā mahiyaṅgaṇaṃ āgantvā
anya-e1202n0:379_5: tattha damiḷe maddanto asitihatthubbedhaṃ kañcukacetiyaṃ kāretvā pūjamakāsi.
anya-e1202n0:380: Evamaccāyikaṃ kammaṃ-karontāpi guṇākarā, karonti puññaṃ sappaññā-saṃsārabhasa bhīrukāti.
anya-e1202n0:382_0: 17. Tato rājā damiḷehi saddhiṃ yujjhitvā chattadamiḷaṃ gaṇhitvā tatra bahu damiḷe
anya-e1202n0:382_1: ghātetvā ambatitthaṃ āgantvā ambadamiḷaṃ catūhi māsehi gaṇhi. Tato oruyha mahabbale
anya-e1202n0:382_2: sattadamiḷe ekāheneva gaṇhi tato antarasobbhe mahākoṭṭha damiḷaṃ-doṇagāme gavara
anya-e1202n0:382_4: dighābhaya damiḷaṃ gaṇhi. Tato kacchatitthe kiñcisīsa damiḷaṃ catūhi māsehi gaṇhi
anya-e1202n0:382_5: tato veṭha nagare tāḷa damiḷaṃ, bhāṇakadamiḷañca-vahiṭṭhe vahiṭṭha damiḷaṃ=gāmaṇimhi
anya-e1202n0:382_6: gāmaṇi damiḷaṃ-kumbugāmamhi kumbu damiḷaṃ-naṇdika gāmamhi naṇdika damiḷaṃ-khāṇugāmamhi
anya-e1202n0:382_7: khāṇu damiḷaṃ-tambunnagāmake mātula bhāgineyye dve damiḷe gaṇhi tadā-
anya-e1202n0:389_0: Evaṃ rājā gaṅgātīre damiḷe ghātesi. Ghātita so sabbe āgantvā vijita nagare pavisiṃsu.
anya-e1202n0:389_1: Tadā rājā vijita nagaraṃ gaṇhituṃ vīmaṃsanatthāya āgacchantaṃ naṇdhimittaṃ disvā
anya-e1202n0:389_2: kaṇḍulaṃ muñcesi. Kaṇḍulopi taṃ gaṇhituṃ āgañchi tadā naṇdhimitto hatthetahi ubho
anya-e1202n0:389_3: dante bāḷhaṃ gahetvā pīḷetvā ukkuṭikaṃ nisīdāpesi. Rājā ubho vimaṃsetvā vijitanagaraṃ
anya-e1202n0:389_4: āgato. Tato dakkhiṇadvāre yodhānaṃ mahāsaṅgāmo ahosi puratthimadvāre veḷusumano assaṃ
anya-e1202n0:389_5: āruyha bahū damiḷe ghātesi damiḷā anto pivisitvā dvāraṃ thakesuṃ. Tato rājā yodhe
anya-e1202n0:389_6: vissajjesi, kaṇḍulahatthi naṇdhimitto suranimmalo ca dakkhiṇadvāre kammaṃ kariṃsu
anya-e1202n0:389_7: mahāsoṇo goṭhayimbaro theraputtābhayo cāti ime tayo itaresu tīsu dvāresu kammaṃ kariṃsu.
anya-e1202n0:390_0: Tañca nagaraṃ parikhāttaya parikkhittaṃ, daḷha pākāra gopuraṃ, ayo dvārayuttaṃ ahosi
anya-e1202n0:390_1: kaṇḍulo jāṇuhi ṭhatvā silā sudhā iṭṭhakā bhiṇditvā ayodvāraṃ pāpuṇi tadā damiḷā gopure
anya-e1202n0:390_2: ṭhatvā nānāvudhāni khipiṃsu pakka ayoguḷe cevapakkaṭṭhita silesañca hatthipiṭṭhiyaṃ
anya-e1202n0:390_3: pakkhipiṃsu? Tadā kaṇḍulo vedanaṭṭo udakaṭṭhānaṃ gantvā udake ogāhi. Tadā goṭhayimbaro
anya-e1202n0:390_4: na idaṃ surāpānaṃ bhavati. Ayodvāra vighāṭanaṃ nāma, gaccha dvāraṃ vighāṭehīti āha.
anya-e1202n0:390_5: Taṃ sutvā jātābhimāto kuñcanādaṃ katvā udana uggamma thale aṭṭhāsi atha hatthivejjo
anya-e1202n0:390_6: silesaṃ dhovitvā osadhaṃ akāsi. Tato rājā hatthiṃ āruyha pāṇinā kumbhe parāmasitvā
anya-e1202n0:390_7: sakala laṅkātale rajjaṃ tava dammīti tosetvā varabhojanaṃ bhojetvā vaṇaṃ sāṭakena
anya-e1202n0:390_8: veṭhetvā suvammītaṃ katvā vammapiṭṭhiyaṃ mahisacammaṃ sattaguṇaṃ katvā baṇdhitvā
anya-e1202n0:390_9: tassupari telacammaṃ baṇdhitvā taṃ vissajjesi so asani viyagajjanto gantvā dāṭhāhi
anya-e1202n0:390_10: padaraṃ vijjhitvā pādena ummāraṃ hani. Dvāraṃ bāhāhi saddhiṃ ayodvāraṃ mahāsaddena
anya-e1202n0:390_11: bhūmiyaṃ pati. Gopure dabbasambhāraṃ pana hatthipiṭṭhiyaṃ patantaṃ disvā naṇdhimitto
anya-e1202n0:390_12: bāhāhi paharitvā pavaṭṭesi tadā kaṇḍulo dāṭhāpīḷanaveraṃ chaḍḍhesi.
anya-e1202n0:391_0: Tato kaṇḍulo attano piṭṭhiṃ ārūhanatthāya naṇdhimittaṃ olokesi. So tayā katamaggena
anya-e1202n0:391_1: na pavisissāmīti aṭṭhārasa hatthubbedhaṃ pākāraṃ bāhunā paharitvā aṭṭhusahappamāṇaṃ
anya-e1202n0:391_2: pākārappadesaṃ pātetvā suranimmalaṃ olokesi sopi tena katamaggaṃ anicchanto pākāraṃ
anya-e1202n0:391_3: laḍḍītvā nagarabbhantare pati goṭhayimbaropi - soṇopi - theraputtābhayopi ekeka dvāraṃ
anya-e1202n0:396_0: Evaṃ vijitanagaraṃ catūhi māsehi bhiṇditvā damiḷe māretvā tato garilokaṃ nāma gantvā
anya-e1202n0:396_1: giriya damiḷaṃ aggahesi. Tato mahela nagaraṃ gantvā catūhi māsehi mahela rājānaṃ
anya-e1202n0:396_2: gaṇhiṃ tato rājā anurudhapuraṃ gacchanto paritokāsapabbate nāma khaṇdhāvāraṃ nivāsetvā
anya-e1202n0:396_3: tattha taḷākaṃ kāretvā jeṭṭhamūlamāsamhi udakakīḷaṃ kīḷi. Eḷāropi duṭṭhagāmaṇissa
anya-e1202n0:396_4: āgatabhāvaṃ sutvā amaccehi saddhiṃ mantetvā sve yuddhaṃ karissāmāti nicchayaṃ akāsi
anya-e1202n0:396_5: punadivase sannaddho mahāpabbata hatthiṃ āruyha mahā balakāya parivuto nikkhami.
anya-e1202n0:396_6: Gāmaṇīpi mātarā saddhiṃ mantetvā dvattiṃsa bala koṭṭhake kāretvā chattadhare rājarūpake
anya-e1202n0:396_7: tattha tattha ṭhapesi. Abbhantara koṭṭhake sayaṃ aṭṭhāsi.
anya-e1202n0:397_0: Tato saṅgāme vattamāne eḷāra rañño dīghajattu nāma mahā yodho khaggaphalakaṃ gahetvā
anya-e1202n0:397_1: bhūmito aṭṭhārasa hatthaṃ nabhamuggantvā rājarūpaṃ chiṇditvā paṭhamaṃ bala koṭṭhakaṃ
anya-e1202n0:397_2: bhiṇdi evaṃ sesepi balakoṭṭhake bhiṇditvā mahāgamaṇinā ṭhataṃ balakoṭṭhakaṃ āgami.
anya-e1202n0:397_3: Tadā suranimmalo rañño parigacchantaṃ disvā attano nāmaṃ sāvetvā taṃ akkosi taṃ sutvā
anya-e1202n0:397_4: dīghajantu paṭhamaṃ imaṃ māremīti kujjhitvā ākasamabbhuggantvā attanopari otarantaṃ
anya-e1202n0:397_5: disvā saranimmalo attano phalakaṃ upanāmesi. Itaropi phalakena saddhiṃ taṃ bhiṇdissa
anya-e1202n0:397_6: mīti cintetvā phalakaṃ pahari. Itaro phalakaṃ muñci, dīghajantu phalakaṃ chiṇdanto
anya-e1202n0:397_7: bhūmiyaṃ pati. Suranimmalo taṃ sattiyā pahari, phussadevo taṃ khaṇe saṅkhaṃ dhami,
anya-e1202n0:397_8: asanisaddo viya ahosi ummādappattā viya manussā ahesuṃ. Tato damiḷa senā bhijjittha,
anya-e1202n0:397_9: eḷāro palāyittha tadāpi bahu damiḷe ghātesuṃ.
anya-e1202n0:401: Na hanissatu eḷāraṃ-maṃ muñciya paro iti;
anya-e1202n0:407: Tomaraṃ khipi eḷāro-sahatthi tattha so pati;
anya-e1202n0:410_0: Atha rājā nagare bheriṃ carāpetvā samantā yojanappamāṇe manusse sannipātetvā eḷāra
anya-e1202n0:410_1: rañño sarīraṃ mahantaṃ sakkāraṃ kāretvā kūṭāgārena netvā jhāpetvā tattha teciyaṃ
anya-e1202n0:410_2: kāretvā parihāramadāsi. Ajjapi rājāno taṃ padesampatvā bheriṃ na vādāpenti. Evaṃ
anya-e1202n0:410_3: duṭṭhagāmaṇi abhaya mahārājā dvattiṃsa damiḷa rājāno māretvā laṅkādīpaṃ ekacchattamakāsi.
anya-e1202n0:411_0: Yadā duṭṭhagāmaṇi vijitaṃ nagaraṃ gaṇhi tadā dīghajantu yodho eḷāraṃ upasaṅkamitvā
anya-e1202n0:411_1: attano bhāgineyyassa bhallukassa yodha bhāvaṃ ācikkhitvā idhāgamanatthāya tassa santikaṃ
anya-e1202n0:411_2: pesesi. Bhallukopi eḷārassa daḍḍhadivasato sattame divase saṭṭhiyā purisa sahassehi
anya-e1202n0:411_3: saddhiṃ otiṇṇo rañño matabhāvaṃ sutvāpi lajjāya yujjhissāmīti mahātitthato nikkhamitvā
anya-e1202n0:411_4: kolambahālake nāma gāme khaṇdhāvāraṃ nivesesi. Rājāpi tassā’gamanaṃ sutvā sannaddho
anya-e1202n0:411_5: kaṇḍulaṃ āruyha yodhaparivuto mahatā balakāyena abhinikkhami. Phussadevopi pañcāvudha
anya-e1202n0:411_6: sannaddho rañño pacchimāsane nisīdi. Bhallukopi pañcāvudha sannaddho hatthiṃ āruyha
anya-e1202n0:411_7: rājābhimukho agañchi. Tadā kaṇḍulo tassa vegamaṇdi bhāvatthaṃ sanikaṃ sanikaṃ paccosakaki
anya-e1202n0:412_0: Rājā phussadevaṃ āha ayaṃ hatthi pubbe aṭṭhavīsatiyā yuddhesu apaccosakakitvā idāni
anya-e1202n0:412_1: kasmā pana paccosakkatīti. So āhādeva. Amhākameva jayo ayaṃ gajo jayabhūmiṃ avekkhanto
anya-e1202n0:412_2: paccosakkati jayabhūmiṃ patvā ṭhassatīti? Nāgopi paccosakakitva pura devassa passe
anya-e1202n0:413_0: Tato bhalluko rājābhimukhā āgantvā rājānaṃ uppaṇḍesi rājāpi khaggatalena mukhaṃ pidhāya
anya-e1202n0:413_1: taṃ akkosi rañño mukhe vijjhissāmīti saraṃ khipi. So khaggatala māgaccabhūmiyaṃ pati,
anya-e1202n0:413_2: bhalluko mukhe viddhesmiti saññāya ukkuṭṭhi, akāsi tadā rañño pacchimāsane nisinno
anya-e1202n0:413_3: phussadevo rañño kuṇḍalaṃ ghaṭento tassa mukhe kaṇḍaṃ pātesi rañño pāde katvā patamānassa
anya-e1202n0:413_4: jāṇumhi aparena kaṇḍena vijjhitvā rañño sīsaṃ katvā pātesi. Rājā laddhajayo nagaraṃ
anya-e1202n0:413_5: āgantvā saraṃ āharāpetvā puṅkhena ujukaṃ ṭhapāpetvā taṃ pamāṇaṃ kahāpaṇarāsiṃ katvā
anya-e1202n0:414_0: Evaṃ laṅkārajjaṃ ekacchattaṃ katvā rājā yodhānaṃ yathānurūpaṃ ṭhānantaraṃ adāsi.
anya-e1202n0:414_1: Theraputtābhayo pana dīyamānaṃ ṭṭhānantaraṃ na gaṇhi kasmā na gaṇhasiti pucchino
anya-e1202n0:414_2: yuddhaṃ atthi mahārājāti āhaṃ. Idāni ekarajje kate kiṃ nāma yuddhanti pucchite kilesa
anya-e1202n0:414_3: corehi yujjhissa mīti āha. Rājā punappunaṃ nivāresi sopi punappuna yācitvā rājānuññāya
anya-e1202n0:414_4: pabbajitvā vipassanāya kammaṃ karonto arahattaṃ patvā pañca khīṇāsavasata parivāro ahosi.
anya-e1202n0:415_0: Tato rājā attano pāsādatale sirīsayanagato mahatiṃ sampattiṃ oloketvā akkhobhiṇi
anya-e1202n0:415_1: senāghātaṃ anussari. Anussarantassa rañño mahantaṃ demanassaṃ uppajji sagga maggantarāyo me bhaveyyāti.
anya-e1202n0:416_0: Tadā piyaṅgudīpe arahanto rañño paricitakkaṃ ñatvā taṃ assāsetuṃ aṭṭha arahante pesse.
anya-e1202n0:416_1: Te āgantvā āgatabhāvā nivedetvā pāsādatalaṃ abhiruhiṃsu rājā there vaṇditvā āsane
anya-e1202n0:416_2: nisīdāpetvā āgata kāraṇaṃ pucchi. Therāpi āgata kāraṇaṃ vatvā rañño tena kammunā
anya-e1202n0:416_3: sagga-mokkhantarāyabhāvaṃ bodhetva pakkamiṃsu rājā tesaṃ vacanaṃ sutvā assāsaṃ paṭilabhitvā
anya-e1202n0:417_0: Mātipitaro kho pana mā co kadācipi vinā saṅghena āhāraṃ bhuñjathāti amhehi sapathaṃ
anya-e1202n0:417_1: kāresuṃ bhikkhusaṅghassa adatvā bhuttaṃ atthi nu kho natthiti cintayanto satisammosena
anya-e1202n0:417_2: saṅghassa adatvā pātarāsakāle paribhuttaṃ ekaṃyeva maricavaṭṭiṃ addasa. Disvā ca
anya-e1202n0:417_3: ayuttaṃ mayā kataṃ daṇḍakammaṃ me kātabbantī cintesi atha rājā chattamaṅgala sattāhe
anya-e1202n0:417_4: vītivatte mahatā rājānubhāvena mahantena kīḷāvidhānena udakakīḷaṃ kīḷituṃ abhisittānaṃ
anya-e1202n0:417_5: rājunaṃ cārittānu pālanatthañca tissavāpiṃ agamāsi. Rañño sabbaṃ paricchadaṃ upāhanachattāni
anya-e1202n0:418_0: Tatrāpi thūpaṭṭhāne rājapurisā rañño sadhātukaṃ kuntaṃ ujukaṃ ṭhapesuṃ. Rājā divasabhāgaṃ
anya-e1202n0:418_1: orodha parivuto kīḷitvā sāyaṇhe jāte nagaraṃ gamissāma kuntaṃ vaḍḍhethāti āha. Rājapurisā
anya-e1202n0:418_2: kuntaṃ gaṇhantā cāletuṃ nāsakkhiṃsu rājasena, taṃ acchariyaṃ disvā samāgantvā gaṇdhamālādīhi
anya-e1202n0:418_3: pūjesi rājāpi mahantaṃ acchariyaṃ disvā haṭṭhamānaso samantā ārakkhaṃ saṃvidahitvā nagaraṃ pāvisi.
anya-e1202n0:419_0: Tato rājā kuntaṃ parikkhipāpetvā cetiyaṃ taṃ parikkhipāpetvā vihārañca kāresi. Vihāro
anya-e1202n0:419_1: tīhi saṃvaccharehi niṭṭhāsiṃ rājā vihāramahatthāya saṅghaṃ sannipātesi bhikkhūnaṃ
anya-e1202n0:419_2: satasahassāni bhikkhunīnaṃ navuti sahassāni sannipatiṃsu tasmiṃ samāgame rājā saṅghaṃ
anya-e1202n0:419_3: vaṇditvā evamāha bhante vissaritvā vinā saṅghena maricavaṭṭikaṃ paribhuñjiṃ tadatthaṃ
anya-e1202n0:419_4: daṇḍakammaṃ me hotūti-sacetiyaṃ maricavaṭṭiyaṃ vihāraṃ kāresiṃ patigaṇhātu bhante
anya-e1202n0:419_5: saṅgho sacetiyaṃ vihāranti dakkhiṇodakaṃ pātetvā bhikkhusaṅghassa vihāraṃ adāsi.
anya-e1202n0:420_0: Vihārassa samantato bhikkhusaṅghassa nisīdanatthāya mahantaṃ maṇḍapaṃ kāresi maṇḍapa
anya-e1202n0:420_1: pādā abhayavāpiyā jale patiṭṭhitā ahesuṃ. Sesokāse kathācanatthi. Tattha bhikkhusaṅghaṃ
anya-e1202n0:420_2: nisīdāpetvā sattāhaṃ mahādānaṃ datvā sabbaparikkhāraṃ adāsi. Tattha saṅghattherena
anya-e1202n0:433_0: 18. Tato rājā cintesi mahāmahiṇdatthero kira mama ayyakassa devānampiyatissa rañño
anya-e1202n0:433_1: evamāha. Nattā te mahārāja duṭṭhagāmaṇi abhayo visaṃ hatthasatikaṃ sovaṇṇamāliṃ thūpaṃ
anya-e1202n0:433_2: kāressati. Saṅghassa ca uposathāgārabhūtaṃ navabhūmakaṃ lohapāsādaṃ kāressatīti cintetvā
anya-e1202n0:433_3: ca pana olokento rājagehe karaṇḍake ṭhapitaṃ suvaṇṇapaṭṭalekhaṃ disvā taṃ vācesi.
anya-e1202n0:433_4: Anāgate cattālīsaṃ vassasataṃ atikkamma kākavaṇṇatissassa putto duṭṭhagāmaṇi abhayo
anya-e1202n0:433_5: idañcidañca kāressatīti sutvā haṭṭho udaggo appoṭhesi-ayyena kira vatamhi diṭṭho mahā mahiṇdenāti.
anya-e1202n0:434_0: Tato pātova mahāmeghavanaṃ gantvā bhikkhusaṅghaṃ sannipātetvā etadavoca? Bhante bhikkhusaṅghassa
anya-e1202n0:434_1: uposathāgāraṃ katvā devavimāna sadisaṃ pāsādaṃ kāressāmi devalokaṃ pesetvā paṭe vimānākāraṃ
anya-e1202n0:434_2: likhāpetvā me dethāti? Saṅgho aṭṭha khīṇāsave pesesi. Te tāvatiṃsabhavanaṃ gantvā
anya-e1202n0:434_3: dvādasayojanubbedhā aṭṭhacattālīsa yojana parikkhepaṃ kūṭāgāraṃ sahassa patimaṇḍitaṃ
anya-e1202n0:434_4: navabhūmakaṃ sahassagabbhaṃ khīraṇa devadhītāya puññānubhāvanibbattaṃ ākāsaṭṭhaṃ
anya-e1202n0:434_5: ratanapāsādaṃ oloketvā hiṅgulakena paṭe tadākāraṃ likhitvā ānetvā bhikkhusaṅghassa
anya-e1202n0:435_0: Taṃ disvā rājā tuṭṭhamānaso tadā taṃ lekhatulyaṃ lohapāsādaṃ kāresi. Kammantārambha
anya-e1202n0:435_1: kāle pana catusu dvāresu aṭṭhasatasahassāni hiraññāni ṭhapāpesi tadā catusu dvāresu
anya-e1202n0:435_2: sahassa sahassaṃ vatthapuṭāni ceva guḷa-tela-sakkhara-madhupurā anekasahassacāṭiyo
anya-e1202n0:435_3: ca ṭhapāpesi. Pāsāde amūlakena kammaṃ na kātabbanti bheriṃ cārapetvā amūlakena katakammaṃ
anya-e1202n0:435_4: agghāpetvā kārakānaṃ mūlaṃ dāpesi. Pāsādo ekekena passena hatthasata hatthasatappamāṇo
anya-e1202n0:435_5: ahosi tathā ubbedhana, navabhūmāyo cassa ahesuṃ ekekissā bhūmiyā sataṃ sataṃ kūṭāgārāni,
anya-e1202n0:435_6: tāni sabbānipi ratanakhacitāni ceva suvaṇṇa kiṅkiṇikāpanti parikkhittāni ca ahesuṃ
anya-e1202n0:435_7: tesaṃ kūṭāgārāni nānāratana bhūsikā pavāḷa vedikā ceva, tāsaṃ padumāni ca nānāratana
anya-e1202n0:435_8: vicittāneva ahesuṃ. Tathā sahassagabbhā ca nānāratana khacitā sīyapañjara vibhūsitā
anya-e1202n0:435_9: ca. Vessavanassa nārivābhanayānaṃ sutvā tadākāraṃ majjhe ratana maṇḍapaṃ kāresi.
anya-e1202n0:436_0: So anekehi ratanatthambhehi sīhavyagghādi rūpehi devatā rūpehi ca patimaṇḍito samantato
anya-e1202n0:436_1: olambaka muttā jālena ca parikkhitto ahosi pavāḷavedikā cassa pubbe vuttappakārāva
anya-e1202n0:436_2: sattaratana vicittamaṇḍapa majjhe pana eḷikamaya bhūmiyā dantamaya pallaṅko ahosi
anya-e1202n0:436_3: apassenampi dantamayameva, so suvaṇṇasūriyamaṇḍalehi rajata caṇda maṇḍalehi muttāmaya
anya-e1202n0:436_4: tārakāhi ca vicitto tattha tattha yathārahaṃ nānāratanamaya padumāni ceva pasāda
anya-e1202n0:436_5: janakāni ca jātakāni antarantarā suvaṇṇalatāyo ca kāresi. Tattha mahagghaṃ paccattharaṇaṃ
anya-e1202n0:436_6: attharitvā manuññaṃ danta vijaniṃ ṭhapesi. Pavāḷamaya pādukā kāresi. Tathā pallaṅkassopari
anya-e1202n0:436_7: eḷikabhūmiyā patiṭṭhitaṃ rajatamayadaṇḍaṃ setaccattaṃ kāresi. Tattha sattaratanamayāni
anya-e1202n0:436_8: aṭṭhamaṅgalāni antarantarā ca maṇimuttāmayā catuppāda pantiyo ca kāresi. Chattante
anya-e1202n0:437_0: Pāsādo chattaṃ pallaṅko maṇḍapo cāti cattāro anagghā ahesuṃ mahagghāni mañcapīṭhāni
anya-e1202n0:437_1: paññatvo tattha mahagghāni kambalāni bhummattharaṇāni attharāpesi āvamana kumhi uḷuṅko
anya-e1202n0:437_2: ca sovaṇṇamayāyeva ahesuṃ. Sesa paribhoga bhaṇḍesu vattabbameva natthi dvārakoṭṭhakopi
anya-e1202n0:437_3: manohara pākārena parikkhitto. Tambalohiṭṭhikābhi pana chāditattā pāsādassa lohapāsādoti vohāro ahosi.
anya-e1202n0:438_0: Evaṃ tāvatiṃsabhavane devasabhā viya pāsādaṃ niṭṭhāpetvā saṅghaṃ sannipātesi. Maricavaṭṭi
anya-e1202n0:438_1: vihāramage viya saṅgho sannipati. Paṭhamabhūmiyaṃ puthujjanāyeva aṭṭhaṃsu dutiyabhūmiyā
anya-e1202n0:438_2: tepiṭakā, tatiyādisu tīsu bhūmisu kamena sotāpanna - sakadāgāmi - anāgāmino, upari
anya-e1202n0:438_3: catusu bhūmisu khīṇāsavāyeva aṭṭhaṃsu. Evaṃ saṅghaṃ sannipātetvā saṅghassa pāsādaṃ
anya-e1202n0:438_4: datvā maricavaṭṭi vihāramahe viya sattāhaṃ mahādānamadāsīti.
anya-e1202n0:443_0: 19. Athekadivasaṃ rājā satasahassaṃ vissajjetvā mahābodhi pūjaṃ kāretvā nagaraṃ pavisanto
anya-e1202n0:443_1: thūpaṭṭhāne patiṭṭhitaṃ silāthūpaṃ disvā mahiṇdattherena vuttavacanaṃ anussaritvā
anya-e1202n0:443_2: mahāthūpaṃ kāressāmīti katasanniṭṭhāno nagaraṃ pavisitvā mahaṃtalaṃ āruyha subhojanaṃ
anya-e1202n0:443_3: bhuñjitvā sirisayanagato evaṃ cintesi mayā damiḷe maddamānena ayaṃ loko ativiya pīḷito,
anya-e1202n0:443_4: kena nu kho upāyena lokassa piḷanaṃ akatvā dhammena samena mahā cetiyassa anucchavikaṃ
anya-e1202n0:443_5: iṭṭhakā uppādessāmīti taṃ cintitaṃ chattaṃ adhivatthā devatā jānitvā rājā evaṃ cintesīti ugghosesi.
anya-e1202n0:444_0: Paramparāya devalokepi kolāhalamahosi taṃ ñatvā sakko devarājaṃ vissakammaṃ āmantetvā’tāta!
anya-e1202n0:444_1: Vissa kamma! Duṭṭhagāmaṇi abhaya mahārājā mahā cetiyassa iṭṭhakatthāya cintesi. Tvaṃ
anya-e1202n0:444_2: gantvā uttarapasse nagarato yojanappamāṇe ṭhāne gambhira nadiyā tīre iṭṭhakā māpetvā ehi’ti pesesi.
anya-e1202n0:445_0: Taṃ ñatvā vissakamma devaputto āgantvā tattheva mahācetiyānucchavikaṃ iṭṭhakā māpetvā
anya-e1202n0:445_1: devapurameva gato. Puna divase eko sunakhaluddo sunakhe gahetvā araññaṃ gantvā tattha
anya-e1202n0:445_2: tattha vicaranto taṃ ṭhānaṃ patvā iṭṭhakā adisvā ca nikkhami. Tasmiṃ khaṇe ekā bhummā
anya-e1202n0:445_3: devatā tassa iṭṭhakā dassetuṃ mahantaṃ godhāvaṇṇaṃ gahetvā luddassa sunakhānañca
anya-e1202n0:445_4: attānaṃ dassetvā tehi anubaddho iṭṭhakābhimukhaṃ attvā antaradhāyi.
anya-e1202n0:446_0: Sunakhaluddo iṭṭhakā disvā amhākaṃ rājā thūpaṃ kāretukāmo, mahanto vata no paṇṇākāro
anya-e1202n0:446_1: laddhoti haṭṭhamānaso puna divase pātoca āgantvā attanā diṭṭhaṃ iṭṭhaka paṇṇākāraṃ
anya-e1202n0:446_2: rañño nivedesi. Rājā taṃ sāsanaṃ sutvā attamano hutvā tassa mahantaṃ sakkāraṃ kāretvā
anya-e1202n0:446_3: taṃyeva iṭṭhaka gopanaṃ kāresi. Tato rājā ahameva iṭṭhakolokanatthāya gacchāmi -
anya-e1202n0:447_0: Tasmiṃyeva khaṇe puna aññaṃ sāsanaṃ āhariṃsu. Nagarato tiyojanamatthake ṭhāne pubbuttarakaṇṇe
anya-e1202n0:447_1: ācāra viṭṭhigāme tiyāmarattiṃ abhippavaṭṭe deve soḷasa karīsappamāṇe padese suvaṇṇabījāni
anya-e1202n0:447_2: uṭṭhahiṃsu. Tāni pamāṇato ukkaṭṭhāni vidatthippamāṇāni. Omakāni aṭṭhaṅgulappamāṇāni
anya-e1202n0:447_3: ahesuṃ, atha vibhātāya rattiyā gāmavāsino suvaṇṇabijāni disvā rāchā’rahaṃ vata bhaṇḍaṃ
anya-e1202n0:447_4: uppannanti samantato ārakkhā saṃvidahitvā suvaṇṇabījāni pātiyaṃ pūretvā āgantvā rañño
anya-e1202n0:447_5: dassesuṃ rājā tesampi yathārahaṃ sakkāraṃ kāretvā teyeva suvaṇṇa gopake akāsi.
anya-e1202n0:448_0: Atha tasmiṃyeva khaṇe aññaṃ sāsanaṃ āhariṃsu. Nagarato pācīnapasse sattayojana matthako
anya-e1202n0:448_1: ṭhāne pāragaṅgāya tambaviṭṭhi nāma janapade tambalohaṃ uppajji. Gāmikā pātiṃ pūretvā
anya-e1202n0:448_2: tambalohaṃ gahetvā āgantvā rañño dassesuṃ rājā yathānurūpaṃ sakkāraṃ tesampi kāretvā
anya-e1202n0:449_0: Tadanantaraṃ aññaṃ sāsanaṃ āhariṃsu. Purato catuyojanamatthako ṭhāne pubbadakkhiṇa
anya-e1202n0:449_1: kaṇṇe sumanavāpigāme uppalakuruviṇda missakā bahū maṇayo uppajjiṃsu gāmikā pātiṃ
anya-e1202n0:449_2: pūretvā āgantvā mānayo rañño dassesuṃ. Rājā tesampi sakkāraṃ kāretvā teyeva gopake akāsi.
anya-e1202n0:450_0: Tadanantaraṃ aññampi sāsanaṃ āhariṃsu. Nagarato dakkhiṇa passe aṭṭhayojana matthake
anya-e1202n0:450_1: ṭhāne ambaṭṭhakola janapade ekasmiṃ leṇe rajataṃ uppajji tasmiṃ samaye nagaravāsiko
anya-e1202n0:450_2: eko vāṇijo bahūhi sakaṭehi haḷiddi siṅgiverādīnamatthāya malayaṃ gato, leṇassa avidūre
anya-e1202n0:450_3: sakaṭāni muñcitvā patodadāruṃ pariyesanto taṃ pabbataṃ abhirūḷho ekaṃ paṇasayaṭṭhiṃ addasa.
anya-e1202n0:451_0: Tassa mahantaṃ cāṭippamāṇaṃ ekameva paṇasa phalaṃ naruṇayaṭṭhiṃ nāmetvā heṭṭhā pāsāṇapiṭṭhiyaṃ
anya-e1202n0:451_1: aṭṭhāsi. So taṃ phalabhārena namitaṃ disvā upagantvā hatthena parāmasitvā pakkabhāvaṃ
anya-e1202n0:451_2: ñatvā vaṇṭaṃ chiṇdi paṇasayaṭṭhi uggantvā yaṭāṭṭhānaṃ aṭṭhāsi vāṇijo aggaṃ datvā
anya-e1202n0:451_3: bhuñjissāmīti cintetvā kālaṃ ghosesi. Tadā cattāro khīṇāsava āgantvā tassa purato
anya-e1202n0:451_4: pāturahesuṃ. Vāṇijo te disvā attamano pāde vaṇditvā nisīdāpetvā tassa phalassa vaṇṭāsamantā
anya-e1202n0:451_5: vāsiyā tacchetvā apassayaṃ luñcitvā apanāmesi. Samantato yusaṃ otaritvā apassayānitaṃ
anya-e1202n0:451_6: āvāṭaṃ pūresi vāṇijo manosilodakavaṇṇa paṇasayusaṃ patte pūretvā adāsi. Te khīṇāsavā
anya-e1202n0:452_0: So puna kālaṃghosesi aññe cattaro khīṇāsavā āgamiṃsu. Tesampi hatthato patte gahetvā
anya-e1202n0:452_1: suvaṇṇavaṇṇehi pana samiñjehi pūretvā adāsi tesu tayo therā ākāsena pakkamiṃsu itaro
anya-e1202n0:452_2: iṇdaguttatthero nāma khīṇāsavo tassa taṃ rajataṃ dassetukāmo upari pabbatā otaritvā
anya-e1202n0:452_3: tassa leṇassa avidūre nisīditvā paṇasa miñjaṃ paribhuñjati upāsako therassa gatakāle
anya-e1202n0:452_4: avasesa miñjaṃ attanāpi khāditvā sesakaṃ bhaṇḍikaṃ katvā ādāya gacchanto theraṃ disvā
anya-e1202n0:453_0: Theropi leṇadvārena sakaṭa samīpagāmi maggaṃ māpetvā iminā maggena gaccha upāsakāti
anya-e1202n0:453_1: āha. So theraṃ vaṇditvā tena maggena gacchanto leṇadvāraṃ patvā samantā leṇaṃ olokento
anya-e1202n0:453_2: taṃ rajatarāsiṃ disvā rajatapiṇḍaṃ gahetvā cāsiyā chiṇditvā rajatabhāvaṃ ñatvā mahantaṃ
anya-e1202n0:453_3: sajjhapiṇḍaṃ gahetvā sakaṭa santikaṃ gantvā tiṇodaka sampanne ṭhāne sakaṭāni nivesetvā
anya-e1202n0:453_4: lahuṃ anurādhapuraṃ gantvā raññño dassetvā tamatthaṃ nivedesi rājā tassāpi yathārahaṃ sakkāraṃ kāresi.
anya-e1202n0:454_0: Tadantaraṃ aññampi sāsanaṃ āhariṃsu nagarato pacchima disābhāge pañca yojana matthake
anya-e1202n0:454_1: ṭhāne uruvela pabbata mahāmalakamattā pacāḷa missakā saṭṭhi sakaṭappamāṇamuttā samuddato
anya-e1202n0:454_2: thalamuggamiṃsu kevaṭṭā disvā rājārahaṃ vata bhaṇḍaṃ uppannanti rāsiṃ katvā ārakkhaṃ
anya-e1202n0:454_3: datvā pātiṃ pūretvā āgantvā rañño dassetvā tamatthaṃ nivedesuṃ. Rājā tesampi yathārahaṃ sakkāraṃ kāresi.
anya-e1202n0:455_0: Puna aññaṃ sāsanaṃ āhariṃsu nagarato pacchimuttara kaṇṇe sattayojana matthake ṭhāne
anya-e1202n0:455_1: peḷivāpi gāmassa vāpiyā otiṇṇa kaṇdare pulina puṭṭhe nisadapotappamāṇa dīghato vidatthicaturaṅgulā
anya-e1202n0:455_2: ummāpupphavaṇṇā cattāro mahāmaṇi uppajjiṃsu. Atheko matto nāma sunakhaluddo sunakhe
anya-e1202n0:455_3: gahetvā tattha vicaranto taṃ ṭhānaṃ patvā disvā rājārahaṃ vata bhaṇḍanti vālikāhi
anya-e1202n0:455_4: paṭicchādetvā āgantvā rañño nivedesi. Rājā tassāpi yathārahaṃ sakkāraṃ kāresi. Evaṃ
anya-e1202n0:455_5: rājā thūpatthāya uppannāni iṭṭhakādīni tadaheva assosi iṭṭhaka rajatānaṃ uppannaṭṭhānaṃ teneva nāmaṃ labhi.
anya-e1202n0:457_0: 20. Atha rājā thūpatthāya uppannāni suvaṇṇādīni āharāpetvā bhaṇḍāgāresu rāsiṃ kāresi
anya-e1202n0:457_1: tato sabbasambhāre samatte visākha puṇṇamuposathadivase patta visākha nakkhatte mahāthūpakaraṇatthāya
anya-e1202n0:457_2: bhūmiparikammaṃ ārabhi. Rājā thupaṭṭhāne patiṭṭhāpitaṃ silāthūpaṃ harāpetvā thirabhāvatthāya
anya-e1202n0:457_3: samantato hatthipākāra pariyantaṃ gambhīrato sataratanappamāṇaṃ bhūmiṃ khanāpetvā
anya-e1202n0:457_4: paṃsuṃ apanetvā yodhehi guḷapāsāṇe attharāpetvā kammārakūṭehi āhanāpetvā cuṇṇavicuṇṇe kāresi.
anya-e1202n0:458_0: Tato cammavinaddhehi pādehi mahā hatthīhi maddāpetvā pāsāṇakoṭṭimassupari navanīta
anya-e1202n0:458_1: mattikaṃ attharāpesi. Ākāsa gaṅgāyahi tipatitaṭṭhāne udakabindūni uggantvā samantā
anya-e1202n0:458_2: tiṃsa yojanappamāṇapadese patanti yattha sayañjātasālī uppajjatti taṃ ṭhānaṃ niccameva
anya-e1202n0:458_3: tintattā nintasīsakoḷaṃ nāma chātaṃ. Tattha mattikā sukhumuttā navanīta mattikāti vuccati.
anya-e1202n0:459_0: Taṃ tato khīṇasavā sāmaṇerā āharanti tāya sabbattha mattikākiccanti ñātabbaṃ. Mattikopari
anya-e1202n0:459_1: iṭṭhakā attharāpesi. Iṭṭhakopari kharasukammaṃ, tassoparikuruviṇdapāsāṇaṃ, tassopariayojālaṃ,
anya-e1202n0:459_2: tassopari khīṇāsava sāmaṇerehi himavantato āhaṭaṃ sugaṇdhamārumbaṃ, tassopari khīrapāsāṇaṃ,
anya-e1202n0:459_3: tassopari eḷikapāsāṇaṃ, tassopari sīlaṃ attharāpesi. Sabbamattikākicce navanītamattikā eva ahosi.
anya-e1202n0:460_0: Silāsatthāropari rasodaka santintena kapittha niyyāsena aṭṭhaṅgulabahalatambalohapaṭṭaṃ,
anya-e1202n0:460_1: tassopari tilatelayantintāya manosilāya sattaṅgula bahalaṃ rajatapaṭṭaṃ attharāpesi
anya-e1202n0:460_2: evaṃ rājā sabbākārena bhūmiparikammaṃ kārāpetvā āsāḷahi sukkapakkhassa cātuddasa
anya-e1202n0:460_3: divase bhikkhusaṅghā sannipātetvā evamāha. Sve puṇṇamuposathadivase uttarāsāḷha nakkhattena
anya-e1202n0:460_4: mahācetiye maṅgaliṭṭhakaṃ patiṭṭhāpessāmi sve thūpūṭṭhāne sabbo saṅgho santipatatūti
anya-e1202n0:460_5: nagare bheriṃ carāpesi mahājano uposathiko hutvā gaṇdhamālādīni gahetvā thūpaṭṭhāne sannipatatūti.
anya-e1202n0:461_0: Tato visākhasiri devanāmake dve amacce āṇāpesi. Tumhe gantvā mahā cetiyaṭṭhānaṃ alaṅkarothāti.
anya-e1202n0:461_1: Te gantvā samantato rajatapaṭṭavaṇṇavālukaṃ okīrāpetvā lājapañcamakāni pupphāni vikiritvā
anya-e1202n0:461_2: kadalitoraṇaṃ ussāpetvā puṇṇaghaṭe ṭhapāpetvā maṇivaṇṇe veḷumhi pañcapaṇṇadhajaṃ
anya-e1202n0:461_3: baṇdhāpetvā gaṇdhasampannāni nānāvidha kusumānisaṇtharāpetvā nānāppakārehi taṃ ṭhānaṃ alaṅkariṃsu.
anya-e1202n0:462_0: Atha rājā sakalanagarañca vihāragāmi maggañca alaṅkārāpesi pabhātāya rattiyā nagare
anya-e1202n0:462_1: catusu dvāresu massu kammatthāya nahāpite, nahāpanatthāyanahāpanake, alaṅkāratthāya
anya-e1202n0:462_2: kappakeva nānāvirāga vattha gaṇdhamālādīni ca sūpavyañjana sampannāni madhurabhattāni
anya-e1202n0:462_3: ca ṭhapāpetvā sabbe nagarā ca jānapadā ca yathāruciṃ massūkammaṃ kāretvā nahātvā
anya-e1202n0:462_4: bhuñjitvā vatthābharaṇādīhi alaṅkaritvā mahācetiyaṭṭhānaṃ āgacchantūti āyuttakehi ārocāpesi.
anya-e1202n0:463_0: Sayampi sabbābharaṇa vibhūsito cattālīsa purisa sahassehi saddhiṃ uposako hutvā anekehi
anya-e1202n0:463_1: sumaṇḍita pasādhitehi amaccehi gahitārakkho alaṅkatāhi devakañña pamāhi nāṭakitthihi
anya-e1202n0:463_2: parivuto amaragaṇa parivuto devarājā viya attano sirisampattihā mahājanaṃ tosayanto
anya-e1202n0:463_3: anekehi turiya saṅghuṭṭhehi vattamānehi aparaṇhe mahāthūpaṭṭhānaṃ upagañji. Mahā
anya-e1202n0:463_4: cetiyaṭṭhāna maṅgalatthāya puṭabaddhāni vatthāni aṭṭhuttara sahassaṃ ṭhapāpesi. Catusu
anya-e1202n0:463_5: passesu vattharāsiṃ kāresi tela-madhu-sakkara-phāṇitādīni ca ṭhapāpesi.
anya-e1202n0:464_0: Atha nānādesato bahū bhikkhū āgamiṃsu rājagahā samantā iṇdiguttatthero nāma asīti
anya-e1202n0:464_1: bhikkhusahassāni gahetvā ākāsenāgañchi tathā bārāṇasiyaṃ isipatane mahā vihārato
anya-e1202n0:464_2: dhammasenatthero nāma dvādasa bhikkhusahassāni. Sāvatthiyaṃ jetavana vihārato piyadassi
anya-e1202n0:464_3: nāma thero saṭṭhi bhikkhu sahassāni vesāliyaṃ mahā vanato buddharakkhitatthero aṭṭhārasa
anya-e1202n0:464_4: bhikkhu sahassāni, kosambiyaṃ ghositārāmato mahādhammarakkhitatthero tiṃsa bhikkhusahassāni.
anya-e1202n0:464_5: Ujjeniyaṃ dakkhiṇagiri mahā vihārato dhammarakkhitatthero cattālīsa bhikkhusahassāni-pāṭaliputte
anya-e1202n0:464_6: asokārāmato mittiṇṇatthero bhikkhūnaṃ satasahassāni saṭṭhiñca sahassāni gaṇdhāra
anya-e1202n0:464_7: raṭṭhato attinna thero nāma bhikkhūnaṃ dve satasahassāni asītiñca sahassāni. Mahāpallava
anya-e1202n0:464_8: bhogato mahādevatthero bhikkhūnaṃ cattāri satasahassāni saṭṭhiñca sahassāni yonakaraṭṭhe
anya-e1202n0:464_9: alasaṇdā nagarato yonaka dhammarakkhitatthero tiṃsa bhikkhu sahassāni. Viñjhāṭavivattaniya
anya-e1202n0:464_10: senāsanato uttaratthero asīti bhikkhusahassāni. Mahābodhimaṇḍa vihārato cittaguttatthero
anya-e1202n0:464_11: tiṃsa bhikkhusahassāni vanavāsibhogato caṇdaguttatthero asīti bhikkhusahassāni. Kelāsa
anya-e1202n0:464_12: mahāvihārato suribhaguttatthero channavuti sahassāni gahetvā ākāsenāgañchi.
anya-e1202n0:469_0: Atha saṅgho parikkhitta pavāḷavedikā viya majjhe rañño okāse ṭhapetvā aññamaññaṃ
anya-e1202n0:469_1: aghaṭṭetvā aṭṭhāsi. Pācinapasse buddharakkhitanāmako khīṇāsāvatthero attanāsadisanāmake
anya-e1202n0:469_2: pañcasatakhīṇāsave gahetvā aṭṭhāsi. Tathā dakkhiṇapasse pacchimapasse uttarapasse
anya-e1202n0:469_3: ca dhammarakkhita - saṅgharakkhita - ānaṇda nāmakā khīṇāsavattherā attanā sadisanāmake
anya-e1202n0:469_4: pañcapañcasata khīṇāsave gahetvā aṭṭhaṃsu piyadassi nāma khīṇāsavatthero mahābhikkhusaṅghaṃ
anya-e1202n0:470_0: Rājā kira saṅghamajjhaṃ pavisantoyeva sace mayā kayiramānaṃ cetiyakammaṃ anantarāyena
anya-e1202n0:470_2: nāmakā therā attanāsadisanāmake pañcapañcasatabhikkhu gahetvā tiṭṭhantu piyadassi
anya-e1202n0:470_3: nāma thero pubbuttarakaṇṇe bhikkhusaṅghaṃ gahetvā tiṭṭhatūti cintesi. Therāpi rañño
anya-e1202n0:470_4: adhippāyaṃ ñatvā tathā ṭhitāti vadantī siddhatthero pana maṅgalo-sumano-padumo-sīvali-caṇdagutto-sūriyagutto-iṇdagu-
anya-e1202n0:470_5: tto-sāgaro-cittaseno -jayaseno-acaloti imehi ekādasahi therehi parivuto puṇṇaghaṭe
anya-e1202n0:471_0: Atha rājā tathā ṭhitaṃ bhikkhusaṅghaṃ disvā pasannacitto gaṇdhamālādīhi pūjetvā padakkhiṇaṃ
anya-e1202n0:471_1: katvā catūsu ṭhānesu vanditvā puṇṇasaṭaṭṭhānaṃ pavisitvā suyaṇṇakhīle paṭimukkaṃrajatamayaṃ
anya-e1202n0:471_2: paribbhamana daṇḍaṃ vijjamānamātāpitūnaṃ ubhato sujātena sumaṇḍita pasādhitena abhimaṅgala
anya-e1202n0:471_3: sammatena amaccaputtena gāhāpetvā mahantaṃ cetiyāvaṭṭaṃ kāretuṃ ārabhi. Tathā kārentaṃ
anya-e1202n0:471_4: pana siddhatthatthero nivāresi. Evaṃ kirassa ahosi - yadi mahārājā mahantaṃ cetiyaṃ
anya-e1202n0:471_5: karoti, aniṭṭhiteyeva marissati anāgate dupparihariyañca bhavissatīti. Tasmiṃ khaṇe
anya-e1202n0:471_6: bhikkhusaṅgho mahā rāja thero pāṇḍito, therassa vacanaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭatīti āha.
anya-e1202n0:472_0: Rājā bhikkhusaṅghassa adhippāyaṃ ñatvā thero karotīti maññamāno kīdisaṃ bhante pamāṇaṃ
anya-e1202n0:472_1: karomīti āha. Thero mama gatagataṭṭhānato cetiyāvaṭṭaṃ karohīti vatvā upadisanto
anya-e1202n0:472_2: āvijjhitvā agamāsi. Rājā therassa vuttanayena cetiyāvaṭṭaṃ kāretvā theraṃ upasaṅkamitvā
anya-e1202n0:472_3: nāmaṃ pucchitvā gaṇdhamālādīhi pūjetvā vambatvā parivāretvā ṭhite sesa ekādasa there
anya-e1202n0:472_4: ca upasaṅkamitvā pūjetvā vaṇditvā tesaṃ nāmāni ca pucchitvā paribbhamana daṇḍagāhakassa
anya-e1202n0:473_0: Ahaṃ deva suppatiṭṭhita brahmā nāmāti vutte tava pitā kiṃ nāmoti pucchitvāna naṇdiseno
anya-e1202n0:473_1: nāmāti vutte mātunāmaṃ pucchi. Sumanādevī nāmāti vutte sabbesaṃ nāmāni abhimaṅgalasammatāni,
anya-e1202n0:473_2: mayā kayaramānaṃ cetiyakammaṃ avassaṃ niṭṭhānaṃ gacchatiti haṭṭho ahosi, tato rājā
anya-e1202n0:473_3: majjhe aṭṭha suvaṇṇaghaṭe rajataghaṭe ca ṭhapāpetvā te parivāretvā aṭṭhuttarasayassa
anya-e1202n0:474_0: Atha aṭṭha suvaṇṇiṭṭhakā ṭhapāpesi. Tāsu ekekaṃ parivāretvā aṭṭhuttarasata aṭṭhuttarasata
anya-e1202n0:474_1: rajatiṭṭhakāyo. Aṭṭhuttarasata aṭṭhuttarasata vatthāni ca ṭhapāpesi. Atha suppatiṭṭhita
anya-e1202n0:474_2: brahmanāmena amaccaputtena ekaṃ suvaṇṇiṭṭhakaṃ gāhāpetvā tena sadisa nāmehi ca jīvamānaka
anya-e1202n0:474_3: mātāpitūhi sattahi amaccaputtehi sesa sattiṭṭhakāyo gāhāpesi.
anya-e1202n0:475_0: Tasmiṃ khaṇe mittatthero nāma puratthima disābhāge paribbhamita lekhāya bhūmiyaṃ
anya-e1202n0:475_1: gaṇdhapiṇḍaṃ ṭhapesi. Jayasenatthero nāma udakaṃ āsiñcitvā santintetvā samaṃ akāsi.
anya-e1202n0:475_2: Suppatiṭṭhitabrahmā bhadda nakkhattena evaṃ nānāvidha maṅgalānisaṅkhaṭaṭṭhāne paṭhamaṃ
anya-e1202n0:475_3: maṅgalikaṭṭhakaṃ patiṭṭhāpesi. Sumanattheronāma jātisumanapupphehi taṃ pūjesi. Tasmiṃ
anya-e1202n0:475_4: khaṇe udakapariyantaṃ katvā mahāpathavi kampo ahosi. Eteneva nayena sesa sattiṭṭhakāyopi patiṭṭhāpesuṃ.
anya-e1202n0:476_0: Tato rājā rajatiṭṭhakāyopi patiṭṭhāpetvā gaṇdhamālādīhi pūjetvā maṅgalavidhānaṃ niṭṭhāpetvā
anya-e1202n0:476_1: suvaṇṇapelāyapupphāni gāhāpetvā pācīnapasse bhikkhusaṅghassa purato ṭhitaṃ mahā buddharakkhitattheraṃ
anya-e1202n0:476_2: upasaṅkamitvā gaṇdhamālādīhi pūjetvā vaṇditvā therassa parivāretvā ṭhita bhikkhūnañca
anya-e1202n0:476_3: nāmāni pucchitvā tato dakkhiṇapasse ṭhitaṃ mahādhammarakkhitattheraṃ pacchimapasse
anya-e1202n0:476_4: ṭhitaṃ mahāsaṅgharakkhitattheraṃ uttarapasse ṭhitaṃ ānaṇdattherañca upasaṅkamitvā
anya-e1202n0:476_5: gaṇdhamālādīhi pūjetvā pañcapatiṭṭhitena vaṇditvā tatheva nāmāni pucchitvā pubbuttara
anya-e1202n0:476_6: kaṇṇaṃ gantvā tattha ṭhitaṃ piyadassi mahātheraṃ vaṇditvā pūjetvā nāmāni pucchitvā santike aṭṭhāsi.
anya-e1202n0:477_0: Thero maṅgalaṃ vaḍḍhento rañño dhammaṃ desesi. Maṅgalapariyosāne sampatta gihiparisāsu
anya-e1202n0:477_1: cattālīsa sahassāni arahanto patiṭṭhahiṃsu. Cattālīsa sahassāni sotāpattiphalo sahassaṃ
anya-e1202n0:477_2: sakadāgāmiphale, sahassaṃ anāgāmiphale, bhikkhūnaṃ pana aṭṭhārasasahassāni arahattaṃ
anya-e1202n0:479_0: 21. Tato rājā bhikkhusaṅghaṃ vaṇditvā yāca mahācetiyaṃ niṭṭhātināva me bhikkhusaṅgho
anya-e1202n0:479_1: bhikkhaṃ gaṇhātūti āha. Bhikkhū nādhivāsesu, anupubbena yācanto upallabhikkhūnaṃ
anya-e1202n0:479_2: sattāhaṃ adhivāsanaṃ labhitvā thūpaṭṭhānassa samantato aṭṭhārasasu ṭhānesu maṇḍape
anya-e1202n0:479_3: kārayitvā bhikkhusaṅghaṃ nisīdāpetvā sattāhaṃ mahādānaṃ datvā sabbesaṃyeva tela-madhu-pāṇitādi
anya-e1202n0:479_4: bhesajjaṃ datvā bhikkhusaṅghaṃ vissajjesi tato nagare bheriṃcārāpetvā sabbe iṭṭhaka
anya-e1202n0:480_0: Tesu eko ahaṃ rañño cittaṃ ārādhetvā mahācetiyaṃ kātuṃ sakkomīti rājānaṃ passi rājā
anya-e1202n0:480_1: kathaṃ karosīti pucchi. Ahaṃ deva pesikānaṃ sataṃ gahetvā ekāhaṃ ekaṃ paṃsusakaṭaṃ
anya-e1202n0:480_2: khepetvā kammaṃ karomīti āha. Rājā evaṃ sati paṃsurāsikaṃ bhavissati. Tiṇarukkhādīni
anya-e1202n0:481: Añño ahaṃ purisasataṃ gahetvā ekāhaṃ ekaṃ paṃsugumbaṃ khepetvā kammaṃ karomīti āha.
anya-e1202n0:482: Añño paṃsūnaṃ pañcammaṇāni khepetvā kammaṃ karomīti āha.
anya-e1202n0:483: Añño dve ammaṇāni khepetvā kammaṃ karomīti āha. Tepi rājā paṭibāhiyeva.
anya-e1202n0:484: Atha añño paṇḍito iṭṭhaka vaḍḍhakī ahaṃ deva udukkhale koṭṭetvā suppehi vaṭṭetvā nisadepiṃsitvā paṃsūnaṃ ekammaṇaṃ ekāheneva khepetvā pesikānaṃ sataṃ gahetvā kammaṃ karomīti āha.
anya-e1202n0:485: Rājā evaṃ sati mahācetiye tiṇādīni na bhavissanti ciraṭṭhitikañca bhavissatiti sampaṭicchitvā puna pucchi-kiṃ saṇṭhānaṃ pana karissasīti.
anya-e1202n0:486_0: Tasmiṃ khaṇe vissakamma devaputto vaḍḍhakissa sarīre adhimucci. Vaḍḍhakī suvaṇṇapātiṃ
anya-e1202n0:486_1: pūretvā udakamāharāpetvā pāṇinā udakaṃ gahetvā udakapiṭṭhiyaṃ āhani. Eḷikaghaṭa sadisaṃ
anya-e1202n0:486_2: mahantaṃ udakabubbulaṃ uṭhṭhāsi. Deva īdisaṃ karomīti āha.
anya-e1202n0:487_0: Rājā sādhūti sampaṭicchitvā tassa sahassagghanakaṃ sāṭaka yugalaṃ, sahassagghanakaṃyeva
anya-e1202n0:487_1: puṇṇakaṃ nāma suvaṇṇālaṅkāraṃ sahassagghanakā pādukā, dvādasa kahāpana sahassāni
anya-e1202n0:487_2: ca datvā anurūpaṭṭhāne gehañca khettañca dāpesi.
anya-e1202n0:488_0: Tato rājārattibhāge cintesi kathaṃ nāma manusse apīletvā iṭṭhakā āharāpeyyanti devatā
anya-e1202n0:488_1: rañño cittaṃ ñatvā cetiyassa catusu dvāresu ekekadivasappahoṇakaṃ katvā tassāyeva
anya-e1202n0:488_2: rattiyā iṭṭhakārāsiṃ akaṃsu vihātāya rattiyā manussā disvā rañño ārocesuṃ. Rājā tussitvā
anya-e1202n0:488_3: vaḍḍhakiṃ kamme paṭṭhapesi. Devatā eteneva nayena yāva mahācetiyassa niṭṭhānaṃ tāva
anya-e1202n0:488_4: ekekassa divasassa pahoṇakaṃ katvā iṭṭhakā āhariṃsu. Sakaladivasabhāge kammaṃ kataṭṭhāne
anya-e1202n0:488_5: mattikā iṭṭhaka cuṇṇaṃ vāpi na paññāyati. Rattiyaṃ devatā antaradhāpenti.
anya-e1202n0:489_0: Atha rājā mahācetiyekammakārāyacatuparisāyahattha kammamūlatthaṃcatusu dvāresu ekekasmiṃ
anya-e1202n0:489_2: bhesajjāni nānāvidha sūpavyañjana saṃyuttaṃ bhattaṃ yāgukhajjakādīni aṭṭhavidha kappiyaya
anya-e1202n0:489_3: pānakāni pañcavidha mukhavāsa sahita tāmbūlāni ca ṭhapāpetvā mahācetiye kammaṃ karontāgahaṭṭhā
anya-e1202n0:489_4: vā pabbajitā vā yathājjhāsayaṃ gaṇhantu mulaṃ agahetvā kammaṃ karontānaṃ kātuṃ na dethāti āṇāpesi.
anya-e1202n0:490_0: Atheko thero cetiyakamme sahāya bhāvaṃ icchanto kammakaraṇaṭṭhāne mattikā sadisaṃ
anya-e1202n0:490_1: katvā attānaṃ abhisaṅkhaṭaṃ mattikā piṇḍaṃ ekena hatthena gahetvā aññena mālā gahetvā
anya-e1202n0:490_2: mahācetiyaṅgaṇaṃ āruyha rājakammike vañcetvā vaḍḍhakissa adāsi. So gaṇhantova pakatimatti
anya-e1202n0:490_3: kā nā bhavatīti ñatvā therassa mukhaṃ olokesi tassākāraṃ ñatvā tattha kolāhala mahosi
anya-e1202n0:490_4: anukkamena rājā sutvā āgantvā vaḍḍhakiṃ pucchi-tuyhaṃ kira bhaṇe eko bhikkhu amūlaka
anya-e1202n0:491_0: So evamāha-yebhuyyena ayyā ekena hatthena pupphaṃ ekena mattikāpiṇḍe gahetvā āharitvā
anya-e1202n0:491_1: denti tenāhaṃ ajānitvā kamme upanesiṃ “ayaṃ pana āgantuko, ayaṃ nevāsikoti ettakaṃ
anya-e1202n0:491_2: jānāmīti.“Tena hi taṃ theraṃ imassa dassehīti ekaṃ mahallaka balatthaṃ vaḍḍhakissa
anya-e1202n0:491_3: santike ṭhapesi vaḍḍhakī puna āgatakāle taṃ theraṃ balatthassa dassesi so taṃ sañjānitvā rañño ārocesi.
anya-e1202n0:492_0: Rājā tassa saññaṃ adāsi. To tvaṃ tayo jātisumana makulakumbhe mahābodhi aṅgaṇe rāsiṃ
anya-e1202n0:492_1: katvā gaṇdhañca ṭhapetvā mahābodhi aṅgaṇaṃ gata kāle āgantukassa therassa pūjanatthāya
anya-e1202n0:492_2: rañño dāpitaṃ gaṇdhamālānti vatvā dehīti. Balattho rañño vuttanayeneva tassa bodhi
anya-e1202n0:492_3: aṅgaṇaṃ gata kāle taṃ gaṇdhamālaṃ adāsi.
anya-e1202n0:493_0: Sopi somanassappatto hutvā selasaṇtharaṃ dhovitvā gaṇdhena paribhaṇḍaṃ katvā silāsaṇtharaṃ
anya-e1202n0:493_1: katvā pupphaṃ pūjetvā catusu ṭhānesu vaṇditvā pācīnadvāre añjaliṃ paggayha pītiṃ
anya-e1202n0:494_0: Balattho tasmiṃ kāle taṃ theraṃ upasaṅkamitvā vaṇditvā evamāha. Bhante tumhākaṃ cetiyakamme
anya-e1202n0:494_1: sahāyabhāvatthāya dinnassa amūlaka mattikāpiṇḍassa mūlaṃ dinnabhāvaṃ rājā jānāpeti
anya-e1202n0:494_2: attano vaṇdanena vaṇdāpetīti. Taṃ sutvā thero anattamano ahosi. Balattho tiṭṭhantu
anya-e1202n0:494_3: bhante tayo sumana makula kumbhātattakāneva suvaṇṇapupphānipi etaṃ mattikapiṇḍaṃ
anya-e1202n0:495_0: Tadā koṭṭhivālajanapade piyaṅgalla vihāravāsī eko thero iṭṭhakavaḍḍhakissa ñātako
anya-e1202n0:495_1: ahosi. So āgantvā vaḍḍhakinā saddhiṃ mantetvā dīgha bahala kiriyato iṭṭhakappamāṇaṃ
anya-e1202n0:495_2: jānitvā gantvā sahattheneva sakkaccaṃ mattikaṃ madditvā iṭṭhakaṃ katvā pacitvā pattatthavikāya
anya-e1202n0:495_3: pakkhipitvā paccāgantvā ekena hatthena rañño iṭṭhakaṃ ekena pupphaṃ gahetvā attano
anya-e1202n0:495_4: iṭṭhakāsa saddhiṃ rañño iṭṭhakaṃ adāsi. Vaḍḍhakī gahetvā kamme upanesi.
anya-e1202n0:496_0: Thero sañjāta pīti somanasso mahācetiye kammaṃ karonto iṭṭha kasālapariveṇe vasati
anya-e1202n0:496_1: tassa taṃ kammaṃ pākaṭaṃ ahosi. Rājā vaḍḍhakiṃ pucchi-bhaṇe ekena kira ayyena amūlika
anya-e1202n0:496_2: iṭṭhakā dinnāti. Saccaṃ deva, ekena ayyena dinna iṭṭhakā amhākaṃ iṭṭhakāya sadisāti
anya-e1202n0:496_3: kamme upanesinti āha. Puna taṃ iṭṭhakaṃ sañjānāsīti raññā vutte ñātakānuggahena na jānāmīti āha.
anya-e1202n0:497_0: Rājā yadi evaṃ taṃ imassa dannehīti balatthaṃ ṭhapesi so taṃ pubbe viya balatthassa
anya-e1202n0:497_1: dassesi. Balattho pariveṇaṃ gantvā santike nisīditvā paṭisaṇthāraṃ katvā bhante tumhe
anya-e1202n0:497_2: āgantukā nevāsikāti pucchi. Āgantukomhī upāsakāti. Katara raṭṭhavāsiko bhanteti koṭṭhivālajanapade
anya-e1202n0:497_3: piyaṅgalla vihāravāsimhi upāsakāti idheva vasatha gacchathāti. Idha na vasāma asukadivase
anya-e1202n0:497_4: gacchāmāti āha. Balatthopi ahampi tumhehi saddhiṃ āgamissāmi. Mayhampi gāmo etasmiṃyeva
anya-e1202n0:497_5: janapade asuka gāmo nāmāti āha. Thero sādhūti sampaṭicchi. Balattho taṃ pavattiṃ rañño nivedesi.
anya-e1202n0:498_0: Rājā balatthassa sahassagghanakaṃ vatthayugalaṃ mahagghaṃ rattakambalaṃ upāhanayugaṃ
anya-e1202n0:498_1: sugaṇdhatelanāḷiṃ aññca bahuṃ samaṇaparikkhāraṃ therassa dehīti dāpesi sopi parikkhāraṃ
anya-e1202n0:498_2: gahetvā pariveṇaṃ gantvā therena saddhiṃ rattiṃ vasitvā pāto saddhiṃyeva nikkhamitvā
anya-e1202n0:498_3: anupubbena gantvā piyaṅgalla vihārassa dissamāne ṭhāne sītacchāyāya theraṃ nisīdāpetvā
anya-e1202n0:498_4: pāde dhovitvā gaṇdhatelena makkhetvā guḷodakaṃ pāyetvā upāhanaṃ paṭimuñcitvā idaṃ
anya-e1202n0:498_5: me parikkhāraṃ kulūpagatherassatthāya gahitaṃ, idāni tumhākaṃ dammi, idaṃ pana sāṭakayugaṃ
anya-e1202n0:498_6: mama puttassa maṅgalatthāya gahitaṃ, tumhe cīvaraṃ katvā pārupathāti vatvā therassa pādamūle ṭhapesi.
anya-e1202n0:499_0: Thero sāṭakayugaṃ pattatthavikāya pakkhipitvā sesaparikkhāraṃ bhaṇḍikaṃ katvā upāhanaṃ
anya-e1202n0:499_1: āruyhaṃ kattayaṭṭhiṃ gahetvā maggaṃ paṭpajji. Balattho tena saddhiṃ thokaṃ gantvā
anya-e1202n0:499_2: “tiṭṭhatha bhante, mayhaṃ ayaṃ maggo“ti vatvā pubbe vuttanayeneva rañño sāsanaṃ therassa ārocesi
anya-e1202n0:500_0: Thero taṃ sutvā mahantena parakkamena katakammaṃ akataṃ viya jātanti domanassappatto
anya-e1202n0:500_1: hutvā assudhāraṃ pavattetvā’upāsaka tava parikkhāraṃ tvameva gaṇhāhī“ti ṭhitakova
anya-e1202n0:500_2: sabbāparikkhāraṃ chaḍḍesi balattho kiṃ nāma bhante vadatha esa rājā tuyhaṃ bhavaggappamāṇaṃ
anya-e1202n0:500_3: katvā paccayaṃ dentopi tava iṭṭhakānurūpaṃ kātuṃ na sakkoti. Kevalaṃ pana mahācetiye
anya-e1202n0:500_4: kammaṃ aññesaṃ apattakaṃ katvā karomīti adhippāyena evaṃ kāreti tumhe pana bhante
anya-e1202n0:500_5: attanā laddhaparikkhāraṃ gahetvā cittaṃ pasādethāti vatvā theraṃ saññāpetvā pakkāmi.
anya-e1202n0:500_6: Imasmiṃ pana cetiye bhatiyā kammaṃ katvā cittaṃ pasādetvā sagge nibbatta sattānaṃ pamāṇaṃ natthi.
anya-e1202n0:501_0: Tāvatiṃsa bhavane kira nibbatta devadhītaro attano sampattiṃ oloketvā kena nu ko
anya-e1202n0:501_1: kammena imaṃ sampattiṃ labhimhāti āvajjamānā mahācetiye bhatiyā kammaṃ katvā laddhabhāvaṃ
anya-e1202n0:501_2: ñatvā bhatiyā katakammassāpi phalaṃ īdisaṃ, attano santakena kammaphalaṃ saddahitvā
anya-e1202n0:501_3: katakammassa phalaṃ kīdisaṃ bhavissatīti cintetvā dibbagaṇdhamālaṃ ādāya rattibhāge
anya-e1202n0:502_0: Tasmiṃ khaṇe bhātivaṅkavāsī mahāsīvatthero nāma cetiyaṃ vaṇdanatthāya gato, tā vaṇdantiyo
anya-e1202n0:502_1: disvā mahāsattapaṇṇirukkhasamīpe ṭhito tāsaṃ yathāruciṃ vaṇditvā gamanakāle pucchi?
anya-e1202n0:502_2: Tumhākaṃ sarīrālokena sakalatambapaṇṇidipo ekāloko, kiṃ kammaṃ karitthāti bhante
anya-e1202n0:502_3: amhākaṃ santake katakammaṃ nāma natthi imasmiṃ cetiye manaṃ pasādetvā bhatiyā kammaṃ
anya-e1202n0:502_4: karimhāti āhaṃsu evaṃ buddhasāsane pasannacittena bhatiyā katakammampi mahapphalaṃ hoti. Tasmā-
anya-e1202n0:505_0: Evaṃ rājā cetiyakammaṃ kārāpento pupphadhānattayaṃ niṭṭhāpesi. Taṃ khīṇāsava thirabhāvatthāya
anya-e1202n0:505_1: bhūmisamaṃ katvā osīdāpesuṃ, evaṃ navavāre citaṃ citaṃ osīdāpesuṃ. Rājā kāraṇaṃ ajānanto
anya-e1202n0:505_2: anattamano hutvā bhikkhusaṅghaṃ sannipātesi. Asīti bhikkhusahassāni sannipatiṃsu
anya-e1202n0:505_3: rājā bhikkhusaṅghaṃ gaṇdhamālādīhi pūjetvā vaṇditvā pucchi’bhante mahācetiye pupphadhānattayaṃ
anya-e1202n0:505_4: navavāre na jānāmī’ti bhikkhusaṅgho āha mahārāja tuyhaṃ kammassa vā jīvitassa vā
anya-e1202n0:505_5: antarāyo natthi. Anāgate thirabhāvatthāya iddhimantehi osīdāpitaṃ, ito paṭṭhāya na
anya-e1202n0:505_6: osīdāpessanti. Tvaṃ aññathattaṃ akatvā mahāthūpaṃ samāpehīti. Taṃ sutvā haṭṭho rājā thūpakammaṃ kāresi.
anya-e1202n0:506_0: Dasapupphadhānāni dasahi iṭṭhakākoṭīhi niṭṭhanaṃ gamiṃsu puna pupphadhānattaye niṭṭhite
anya-e1202n0:506_1: bhikkhusaṅgho uttara-sumana nāmake dve khīṇāsava sāmaṇere āṇāpesi. Tumhe samacaturassaṃ
anya-e1202n0:506_2: aṭṭharatana bahalaṃ ekeka passato asīti asiti hatthappamāṇaṃ chamedaka vaṇṇapāsāṇe
anya-e1202n0:506_3: āharathāti. Te sādhūti sampaṭicchitvā uttarakuruṃ gantvā cuttappakārappamāṇe bhaṇḍipupphanihecha
anya-e1202n0:506_4: medavaṇṇapāsāṇe āharitvā ekaṃ pāsāṇaṃ dhātugabbhassa bhūmiyaṃ attharitvā cattāro
anya-e1202n0:506_5: pāsāṇe catusu passesu saṃvidhāya aparaṃ dhātugabbhaṃ pidahanatthāya pācīna disābhāge
anya-e1202n0:506_6: vāluka pākāra samīpe adissamānaṃ katvā ṭhapesuṃ.
anya-e1202n0:507_0: 22. Tato rājā dhātugabbhassa majjhe sabbaratanamayaṃ sabbākārasampannaṃ manoharaṃ
anya-e1202n0:507_1: bodhirukkhaṃ kāresi so hi iṇdanīlamaṇibhūmiyaṃ patiṭṭhito, tassamūlāni pacāḷamayāni,
anya-e1202n0:507_2: khaṇdho sirivacchādīhi aṭṭhamaṅgalikehi pupphapanti latāpanti catuppada haṃsapantihi
anya-e1202n0:507_3: ca vicitto aṭṭhārasa hatthubbedho rajatamayo ahosi.
anya-e1202n0:508_0: Pañcamahāsākhāpi aṭṭhārasahatthāca, pattāpi maṇimayāni, paṇḍupattāni, hemamayāni,
anya-e1202n0:508_1: phalā pavāḷamayāni. Tathā aṅkuropari celavitānaṃ baṇdhāpesi. Tassa ante samannato
anya-e1202n0:508_2: muttamaya kiṅkiṇikajālaṃ olambati. Svaṇṇaghaṇṭāpanti ca suvaṇṇadāmāni ca tahiṃ tahiṃ
anya-e1202n0:508_3: olambanti vitānassa catusu kaṇṇesu navasatasahassagghanako ekeko muttākalāpo olambati.
anya-e1202n0:508_4: Tattha yathānurūpaṃ nānāratana katāneva caṇda-sūriya-tārakārūpāni padumāni ca appitāni
anya-e1202n0:508_5: ahesuṃ. Mahagghāni anekavaṇṇāni aṭṭhuttara sahassāni vatthāni olambiṃsu.
anya-e1202n0:509_0: Tato bodhirukkhassa samantato satta ratanamaya vedikā kāretvā mahāmalaka muttā attharāpesi
anya-e1202n0:509_1: muttā vedikānaṃ antare gaṇdhodaka puṇṇa sattaratanamaya puṇṇaghaṭa pantiyo ṭhapāpesi.
anya-e1202n0:509_2: Tāsu suvaṇṇaghaṭe pavāḷamayāni pupphāni ahesuṃ. Pavāḷaghaṭe suvaṇṇamayāni pupphāni.
anya-e1202n0:509_3: Maṇighaṭe rajatamayāni pupphāni rajataghaṭe maṇimayānipupphāti. Sattaratanaghaṭe
anya-e1202n0:510_0: Bodhirukkhassa pācīna disābhāge ratanamaye koṭiagghanake pallaṅke ghanakoṭṭima suvaṇṇamayaṃ
anya-e1202n0:510_1: buddhapaṭimaṃ nisīdāpesi. Tassā paṭimāya vīsati nakhā akkhinaṃ setaṭṭhānāni ca phaḷakamayāni.
anya-e1202n0:510_2: Hatthatala pādatala dantāvaraṇāni akkhīnaṃ rattaṭṭhātāni ca pavāḷamayāni kesa bhamukāni
anya-e1202n0:510_3: akkhinaṃ kāḷakaṭṭhānāni ca iṇdanīla maṇimayāni uṇṇālomaṃ panaṃ rajatamayaṃ ahosi.
anya-e1202n0:510_4: Tato sahampati mahā brahmānaṃ rajatacchattaṃ dhāretvā ṭhinaṃ kāresi. Tatā dvīsu devalokesu
anya-e1202n0:510_5: devatāhi saddhiṃ vijayuttarasaṅkhaṃ gahetvā abhisekaṃ dadamānaṃ sakkaṃ devarājānaṃ
anya-e1202n0:510_6: pañcasikha devaputtaṃ beḷuva paṇḍu vīṇamādāya gaṇdhabbaṃ kurumānaṃ. Mahākāḷa nāgarājānaṃ
anya-e1202n0:511_0: Vasavattimārampana bāhusahassaṃ māpetvā tisūla muggarādi nānāvudhāni gahetvā sahassakumbhaṃ
anya-e1202n0:511_1: girimekhala hatthikkhaṇdha māruyha mārabalaṃ parivāretvā bodhimaṇḍaṃ āgantvā aneka
anya-e1202n0:511_2: bhiṃsanakaṃ kurumānaṃ kāresi. Sesāsu disāsu pācīna disābhāge pallaṅkasadise koṭi
anya-e1202n0:511_3: koṭi agghanake tayo pallaṅke attharāpetvā dantamayaṃ daṇḍaṃ pavāḷavījaniṃ ṭhapāpesi.
anya-e1202n0:511_4: Bodhikkhaṇdhaṃ ussīsake katvā nānāratanaṃ maṇḍitaṃ koṭiagghanakaṃ rajata sayanaṃ attharāpesi.
anya-e1202n0:512_0: Dasabalassa abhisambodhimpatvā animisena cakkhunā bodhipallaṅkaṃ olokitaṭṭhānaṃ sattāhameva
anya-e1202n0:512_1: ratanacaṅkame caṅkamitaṭṭhānaṃ olokitaṭṭhānaṃ sattāhameva ratanacaṅkame caṅkamitaṭṭhānaṃ
anya-e1202n0:512_2: ratanagharaṃ pavisitvā dhammasammasitaṭṭhānaṃ mucaliṇdamūlaṃ gantvā nisinnassa mucaliṇdena
anya-e1202n0:512_3: nāgena sattakkhattuṃ bhogehi parikkhipitvā upari phaṇaṃ katvā ṭhitaṭṭhānaṃ, tato
anya-e1202n0:512_4: ajapāla nigrodha mūlaṃ gantvā nisinnaṭṭhānaṃ, tato rājāyatanaṃ bhojane upanīte catumahārājehi
anya-e1202n0:513_0: Tato brahmāyācanaṃ dhammacakkappavattanaṃ sasapabbajjaṃ, bhaddavaggiya pabbajjaṃ,
anya-e1202n0:513_1: tebhātika jaṭila damanaṃ, laṭṭhivanuyyāne bimbisāropagamaṇaṃ, rājagahappavesanaṃ,
anya-e1202n0:513_2: veḷuvana paṭiggahaṇaṃ asīti mahāsāvake ca kāresi tato kapilavatthugamanaṃ ratanacaṅkame
anya-e1202n0:515: Abhidhamma desanā devorohaṇa pāṭīhīraṃ therapañha samāgamañca kāresi.
anya-e1202n0:516_0: Tathā mahāsamayasutta-rāhulovāda sutta-maṅgasuttapārāyana sutta samāgamaṃ dhanapāla-āḷavaka-aṅgulimāla-apalāla
anya-e1202n0:516_1: damanaṃ āyusaṅkhāra vossajjanaṃ sūkaramaddava pariggahaṇaṃ siṅgivaṇṇa vatthayuga
anya-e1202n0:516_2: paṭiggahaṇaṃ pasannodakapānaṃ parinibbānaṃ devamanussa paridevanaṃ mahākassapattherassabhagavatopādavaṇdanaṃ
anya-e1202n0:516_3: sarīra ṅahanaṃ agginibbānaṃ āḷāhanasakkāraṃ deṇena brāhmaṇena katadhātu vibhāgañca kāresi.
anya-e1202n0:517_0: Tathā addhacchaṭṭhāni jātakasatāni kāresi. Vessantarajātakaṃ pana kārento sañjaya
anya-e1202n0:517_1: mahārājaṃ phusatīdeviṃ maddideviṃ jāliya kumāraṃ kaṇhājinañca kāresi. Tato paṇḍava
anya-e1202n0:517_2: hatthidānaṃ satta sataka mahādānaṃ nagara vilokanaṃ siṇdhavadānaṃ devatāhi rohitatha
anya-e1202n0:517_3: vaṇṇena rathassa vahanaṃ rathadānaṃ sayamevoṇata dumato phalaṃ gahetvā dārakānaṃ
anya-e1202n0:517_4: madhumaṃsa dinna nesādassa suvaṇṇa sūcidānaṃ vaṅkapabbatakucchimhi pabbajjāvesena
anya-e1202n0:517_5: vasitaṭṭhānaṃ pūjakassa dārakadānaṃ sakkabrāhmaṇassa bhariyaṃdānaṃ pūjakassa devatānubhāveka
anya-e1202n0:517_6: dārake gahetvā gantvā sañjaya nariṇdassa purato gataṭṭhānaṃ tato vaṅkapabbatakucchiyaṃ
anya-e1202n0:517_7: channaṃ khattiyānaṃ samāgamaṃ vessantarassa maddiyā ca abhisekaṃ pattaṭṭhānaṃ nakarampaviṭṭhe
anya-e1202n0:517_8: sattaratanavassaṃ vassitaṭṭhānaṃ tato cavitvā tusitapure nibbattaṭṭhānañca sabbaṃ vitthārena kāresi.
anya-e1202n0:518_0: Tato dasa sahassa cakkavāḷadevatāhi buddha bhāvāya āyācitaṭṭhānaṃ apunarāvattanaṃ
anya-e1202n0:518_1: mātukucchiokkamanaṃ mahāmāyādeviṃ suddhodana mahārājaṃ lumbinīvane jātaṭṭhānaṃ antalikkhato
anya-e1202n0:518_2: dvinnaṃ udakadhārānaṃ patanaṃ uttarābhimukhaṃ sattapadavītihāra gamanaṃ kāḷadevaḷassa
anya-e1202n0:518_3: jaṭāmatthake mahāpurisassa pādapatiṭṭhāna anativattamānāya jambucchāyāya dhātīnaṃ
anya-e1202n0:518_4: pamādaṃ disvā sirisayane pallaṅke nisīditvā jhānasamāpannaṭṭhānañca kāresi.
anya-e1202n0:519_0: Tato rāhula mātaraṃ rāhula bhaddakañca kāresi tato ekūna tiṃsavassakāle uyyāne kīḷatatthāya
anya-e1202n0:519_1: gamana samaye jiṇṇa vyādhita mata saṅkhyāte tayo devadūte disvā nivattanaṭṭhānaṃ
anya-e1202n0:519_2: catutthavāre pabbajitarūpaṃ disvā sādhupabbajjāti cittaṃ uppādetvā uyyānaṃ gantvā
anya-e1202n0:519_3: uyyānasiriṃ anubhavitvā sāyaṇha samaye nahātvā maṅgala silāpaṭṭe nisinnamatta vissakaṭṭhānā
anya-e1202n0:519_4: alaṅkaraṇaṭṭhāṇaṃ tato majjhimarattiyaṃ nāṭakānaṃ vippakāraṃ disvā kaṇthaka haya
anya-e1202n0:519_5: varamāruyha) mahābhinikkhamaṇaṃ nikkhamitaṭṭhānaṃ dasa sahassa) cakkavāḷa devatāhi
anya-e1202n0:519_6: kata pūjāvidhiṃ kaṇthakanivattana cetiyaṭṭhānaṃ anomā nadītīre pabbajjaṃ rājagahappavesanaṃ
anya-e1202n0:519_7: paṇḍava pabbataccha yāya rañño bimbisāramma rajjakaraṇatthāya āyācanaṃ sujātāya dinna
anya-e1202n0:519_8: khīrapāyāsa paṭiggahaṇaṃ nerañjarāya nadiyā tīre pāyāsa paribhogaṃ nadiyā pātivissaṭṭhaṃ
anya-e1202n0:519_9: pāṭihāriyaṃ sālavane divāvihāra gataṭṭhānaṃ sotthiyena dinna kusatiṇapaṭiggahaṇaṃ
anya-e1202n0:519_10: bodhimaṇḍaṃ āruyha nisinnaṭṭhānañca sabbaṃ vitthārena kāresi.
anya-e1202n0:520_0: Tato mahiṇdatthera pamukhe satta saha āgate ca kārāpesi. Catusu disāsu khaggahatthe
anya-e1202n0:520_1: cattāro mahārājāno kāresi tato dvattiṃsa devaputte tato suvaṇṇa daṇḍa dīpakadhārā
anya-e1202n0:520_2: dvattiṃsa devakumāriyo tato aṭṭhavīsati yakkhasenāpatino tato añjaliṃ paggayha ṭhita
anya-e1202n0:520_3: devatāyo tato ratanamaya puppakalāpe gahetvā ṭhita devatāyo tato suvaṇṇaghaṭe gahetvā
anya-e1202n0:520_4: ṭhiti devatāyo tato naccanaka devatāyo tato turiyavādaka devatāyo tato pacceka satasahassagghanake
anya-e1202n0:520_5: dasahatthappamāṇe ādāse gahetvā ṭhita devatāyo tato tatheva satasahassagghanaka puppha
anya-e1202n0:520_6: sākhāyo gahetvā ṭhitadevatāyo tato caṇdamaṇḍale gahetvā ṭhitadevatāyo sūriyamaṇḍale
anya-e1202n0:520_7: gahetvā ṭhitadevatāyo tato padumāni gahetvā ṭhita devatāyo tato chattāni gahetvā
