anya-e1202n0:520_8: ṭhitadevatāyo tato vicittavesadhare malladevaputte tato dussapoṭhana devatāyo tato
anya-e1202n0:520_9: ratanagghike gahetvā ṭhitadevatāyo tato dhammacakkāki gahetvā ṭhitadevatāyo tato
anya-e1202n0:520_10: khaggadharā devatāyo tato pañcahatthappamāṇa gaṇdhitelapūritā dukūlavaṭṭiyaṃ pajjalita
anya-e1202n0:520_11: dīpakañcanana pātiyo sīsehi dhāretvā ṭhitadevatāyo ca kārāpesi.
anya-e1202n0:521_0: Tato catusukaṇṇesuphaḷikamayaagghiya matthake cattāromahāmaṇa ṭhapāpesi catusu kaṇṇesu
anya-e1202n0:521_1: suvaṇṇa-maṇi-mutta-vajirānaṃ cattāro rāsiyo kāresi tato meghavaṇṇa pāsāṇabhittiyaṃ
anya-e1202n0:521_2: vijjullatā kāresi tato ratana latāyo tato cāḷavijatiyo tato niluppale gahetvā ṭhita
anya-e1202n0:522_0: Rājā ektikāni rūpakāni ghanakoṭṭima suvaṇṇeheva kāresi. Avasesampi pūjāvidhiṃ sattarataneheva
anya-e1202n0:522_1: kāresīti. Ettha ca vuttappakārampana pūjanīyabhaṇḍaṃ anantamaparimāṇaṃ hoti tathā
anya-e1202n0:522_2: hi ambapāsānavāsī cittaguttattheronāma heṭṭhā lohapāsāde sannipatitānaṃ dvādasannaṃ
anya-e1202n0:522_3: bhikkhusahassānaṃ dhammaṃ kathento rathavinītasuttaṃ ārabhitvā mahā dhātunidhānaṃ
anya-e1202n0:522_4: vaṇṇento ekacce na saddahissantīti maññamāno osakkitvā kathesi. Tasmiṃ khaṇe koṭapabbatavāsī
anya-e1202n0:522_5: mahātissatthero nāma khīṇāsavo avidūre nisīditvā dhammaṃ suṇanto āvuso dhammakathika
anya-e1202n0:522_6: tava kathāto parihīnampi atthi. Apacco sakakitvā vitthārena kathehīti āha. Atha imasmiṃyeva
anya-e1202n0:522_7: dīpe bhātiya mahārājā nāma saddo pasanno ahosi so sāyaṃ pātaṃ mahacetiyaṃ vaṇditvāva
anya-e1202n0:522_8: bhuñjati. Ekadivasaṃ vinicchaye nisīditva dubbīnicchitaṃ aṭṭaṃ vinicchinanto atisāyaṃ
anya-e1202n0:522_9: vuṭṭhito thūpavaṇdanaṃ vissaritvā bhojane upanīte hatthaṃ otāretvā manusse pucchiajja
anya-e1202n0:522_10: mayā ayyako vaṇdito na vaṇditoti. Porāṇaka rājāno hi satthāraṃ ayyakoti vadanti.
anya-e1202n0:523_0: Tasmiṃ khaṇe rājā hatthena gahita bhattapiṇḍaṃ pātiyaṃ pātetvā uṭṭhāya dakkhiṇadvāraṃ
anya-e1202n0:523_1: vivarāpetvā āgantvā pācīna dvārena mahācetiyaṅgaṇaṃ āruyha vaṇdanto anto dhātugabbhe
anya-e1202n0:523_2: khīṇāsavānaṃ dhammaṃ osāraṇasaddaṃ sutvā dakkhiṇadvāreti maññamāno tattha gantvā
anya-e1202n0:523_3: adisvā eteneva nayena itarānipi dvārāni gantvā tatthāpi adisvā ayyā dhammaṃ osārento
anya-e1202n0:523_4: vicarantīti maññamāno olokanatthāya catusu dvāresu manusse ṭhapetvā sayaṃ puna vicaritvā
anya-e1202n0:523_5: apassanto manusse pucchitvā bahiddhā natthi bhāvaṃ ñatvā anto dhātugabbhe bhavissatiti
anya-e1202n0:523_6: sanniṭṭhānaṃ katvā pācīnadvāre āsannatare mahā cetiyābhimukho hatthapāde pasāretvā
anya-e1202n0:523_7: jīvituṃ pariccajitvā daḷhasamādānaṃ katvā nipajji. Sace mā ayyā dhātugabbhaṃ na olokāpenti-sattāhaṃ
anya-e1202n0:523_8: nirāhāro hutvā sussamāno bhūsamuṭṭhi viya vippakiriyamānopi na uṭṭhahissāmīti. Tassa
anya-e1202n0:524_0: Sakko āvajjanto taṃ kāraṇaṃ ñatvā agantvā dhammaṃ osārentānaṃ therānaṃ evamāha. Ayaṃ
anya-e1202n0:524_1: bhante rājā dhammiko buddhasāsane pasanno imasmiṃ ṭhāne sajjhāyana saddaṃ sutvā dhātugabbhaṃ
anya-e1202n0:524_2: apassitvā na uṭṭhahissāmīti daḷhasamādānaṃ katvā nipanno sace dhātugabbhaṃ na passati
anya-e1202n0:524_3: tattheva marissati. Taṃ pavesetvā dhātu gabbhaṃ olokāpethāti. Therāpi tassa anukampāya
anya-e1202n0:524_4: dhātugabbhaṃ dassetuṃ ekaṃ theraṃ āṇāpesuṃ rājānaṃ ānetvā dhātugabbhā olokāpetvā
anya-e1202n0:524_5: pesehīti. So rañño hatthe gahetvā dhātugabbhaṃ pavesetvā yathāruciṃ vaṇdāpetvā sabbaṃ
anya-e1202n0:524_6: sallakkhitakāle pesesi rājā nagaraṃ gantvā aparena samayena dhātugabbhe attanā diṭṭharūpakesu
anya-e1202n0:524_7: ekadesāni suvaṇṇakhacitāni kāretvā rājaṅgaṇe mahantaṃ maṇḍapaṃ kāretvā tasmiṃ maṇḍape
anya-e1202n0:524_8: tāni rūpakāni saṃvidahāpetvā nagare sannipātetvā dhātugabbhe mayā diṭṭhāni suvaṇṇarūpakāni
anya-e1202n0:524_9: īdisāni āha. Tesaṃ rūpakānaṃ niyāmena katattā niyāmaka rūpakāni nāma jātāni.
anya-e1202n0:525_0: Rājā saṃvacchare saṃvacchare tāni rūpakāni nīharāpetvā nāgarānaṃ dassesi paṭhamaṃ
anya-e1202n0:525_1: dassitakāle nāgarā pasīditvā ekeka kulato ekekaṃ dārakaṃ nīharitvā pabbājesuṃ. Puna
anya-e1202n0:525_2: rājā ayyā etaṃ pakāraṃ ajānanakā bahū tesampi ārocessāmīti vihāraṃ gantvā heṭṭhā
anya-e1202n0:525_3: lohapāsāde bhikkhusaṅghaṃ sannipātetvā sayaṃ dhammāsanagato tiyāma rattiṃ dhātugabbhe
anya-e1202n0:525_4: adhikāraṃ kathetvā pariyosāpetumasakkāntoseva uṭṭhāsi. Tattheko bhikkhu rājānaṃ pucchi-mahārāja
anya-e1202n0:525_5: tvaṃ pātarāsabhattaṃ bhūtvā āgatosi. Tiyāma rattiṃ vaṇṇento dhātugabbhe pūjāvidhimpi
anya-e1202n0:526_0: Rājā kiṃ katheta bhante, tumhākaṃ mayā kathitaṃ dasabhāgesu ekabhāgampi nappahoti.
anya-e1202n0:526_1: Ahampana mayā sallakkhita mattameva kathesiṃ. Anantaṃ bhante dhātugabbhe pūjāvidhānanti
anya-e1202n0:526_2: āha evaṃ anantaṃ pūjanīyabhaṇḍaṃ samacaturasse ekeka passato asīti asīti hatthappamāṇe
anya-e1202n0:526_3: dhātugabbhe nirantaraṃ katvā puretumpi na sukaraṃ, pageva yathārahaṃ saṃvidhātu tiṭṭhatu
anya-e1202n0:526_4: tāva dhātugabbho yāva mahācetiye vāluka pākāra paricchedā nirantaraṃ puretumpi na
anya-e1202n0:526_5: sakkā. Tasmā taṃ sabbaṃ pūjanīyabhaṇḍaṃ tattha kathaṃ gaṇhīti yadettha vattabbaṃ porāṇehi vuttameva.
anya-e1202n0:527_0: Nigro dhapiṭṭhi tepiṭaka mahāsīvatthero kira rājagehe nisiditvā rañño dasabala sīhanādasutataṃ
anya-e1202n0:527_1: kathento dhātunidhānaṃ vaṇṇetvā suttantaṃ vinivaṭṭesi. Rājā therassa evamāha-ayaṃ
anya-e1202n0:527_2: bhante dhātugabbhā samacaturasso, ekekapassato asīti asīti hatthappamāṇe ettakāni
anya-e1202n0:527_3: pūjanīya bhaṇḍāni ettha ṭṭhitānīti ko saddahessatiti. Thero āha. Iṇdasālaguhākittakappamāṇāti
anya-e1202n0:527_4: tayā sutapubbāti. Rājā khuddaka mañcakappamāṇā bhanteti āha. Tato thero āha, mahārāja
anya-e1202n0:527_5: amhākaṃ satthārā sakkasasa sakka pañhasuttantaṃ kathanadivase guhāya kittakā parisā
anya-e1202n0:527_6: osaṭāti sutapubbāti. Rājā dvīsu bhante devalokesu devatāti āha. Evaṃ sante tampi
anya-e1202n0:527_7: asaddaheyyaṃ nu mahārājāti therena vutte rājā taṃ pana devānaṃ deviddhiyā ahosi deviddhi
anya-e1202n0:528_0: Tato thero mahārāja taṃ ekāyayeva deviddhiyā ahosi. Idaṃ pana rañño rājiddhiyā devānaṃ
anya-e1202n0:528_1: deviddhiyā ariyānaṃ ariyiddhiyāti imāhi tīhi iddhīhi jātanti avoca. Rājā therassa
anya-e1202n0:528_2: vacanaṃ sādhūti sampaṭicchitvā theraṃ setacchattena pūjetvā matthake chattaṃ dhārento
anya-e1202n0:528_3: mahā vihāraṃ ānetvā puna mahācetiyassa sattāhaṃ chattaṃ datvā jāti sumanapuppha pūjaṃ
anya-e1202n0:528_4: akāsīti. Etassatthassa sādhanatthameva aññānipi bahūni vatthūni dassitāni tāni kintehīti
anya-e1202n0:528_5: amhe upekkhitāni ettha ca rājā mahesakkho mahānubhāvo pūritapārami katābhinīhāroti
anya-e1202n0:528_6: tassavasena rājiddhiveditabbā sakkena āṇattena vissakammunā devaputtena ādito paṭṭhāya
anya-e1202n0:528_7: āvisitvā katattā tassa vasena devidadhi veditabbā, kammādhiṭṭhāyaka iṇdaguttatthero
anya-e1202n0:528_8: khuddānukhuddakaṃ kammaṃ anuvidhāyanto kāresi na kevalaṃtheroyeva, sabbepi ariyā
anya-e1202n0:528_9: attanā attanā kattabba kiccesu ussukkamāpannāyeva ahesunti imāhi tīhi iddhīhi katanti veditabbaṃ.
anya-e1202n0:535_0: 23. Evaṃ rājā dhātugabbhe kattabba kammaṃ niṭṭhāpetvā cātuddasi divase vihāraṃ gantvā
anya-e1202n0:535_1: bhikkhusaṅghaṃ sannipātesi, sannipatti bhikkhū tiṃsa sahassāni ahesuṃ rājā bhikkhusaṅghaṃ
anya-e1202n0:535_2: vaṇditvā evamāha. Dhātugabbhe mayā kattabbakammaṃ niṭṭhāpitaṃ, sve āsāḷabhimuposatha
anya-e1202n0:535_3: divase uttarasāḷha nakkhattena dhātunidhānaṃ bhavissati dhātuyo janātha bhanteti
anya-e1202n0:536_0: Atha bhikkhusaṅgho dhātu āharaṇakaṃ bhikkhuṃ gavesanto pūjā pariveṇa vāsikaṃ soḷasa
anya-e1202n0:536_1: vassuddesikaṃ chaḷabhiññaṃ soṇuttaraṃ nāma sāmaṇeraṃ disvā taṃ pakkosāpetvā āvuso
anya-e1202n0:536_2: soṇuttara rājā dhātugabbhaṃ niṭṭhāpetvā dhātu ābharaṇaṃ bhikkhusaṅghassa bhāramakāsi.
anya-e1202n0:536_3: Tasmā tayā dhātuyo āharitabbāti āharāmi bhante dhātuyo kuto lacchāmīti pucchi tassa
anya-e1202n0:536_4: bhikkhusaṅgho evamāha. Āvuso soṇuttara tatāgato maraṇamañce nipanno sakkaṃ devarājānaṃ
anya-e1202n0:536_5: āmantetvā mayhaṃ aṭṭhadoṇappamāṇesu sārīrika dhātusu ekaṃ doṇaṃ koḷiyarājuhi sakkataṃ,
anya-e1202n0:536_6: anāgate tambapaṇṇi dīpe mahācetiye patiṭṭhahissatīti āha.
anya-e1202n0:537_0: Atha bhagavati parinibbute doṇa brāhmaṇo dhātuyo aṭṭha koṭṭhāse katvā aṭṭhannaṃ nagaravāsīnaṃ
anya-e1202n0:537_1: adāsi te attano attano nagare cetiyaṃ kāretvā parihariṃsu tesu rāmagāme koḷiyehi
anya-e1202n0:537_2: katacetiye mahoghena bhinne dhātukaraṇḍako samuddaṃ pavisitvā ratanavālukā piṭṭhe
anya-e1202n0:538_0: Nāgā disvā mañjerika nāga bhavanaṃ gantvā mahākāḷa nāga rañño ārocesuṃ so dasakoṭi
anya-e1202n0:538_1: nāga sahassa parivuto āgantvā gaṇdhamālādīhi pūjetvā suvaṇṇa-pavāḷa-miṇi-rajatadhaje
anya-e1202n0:538_2: ussāpetvā pañcaṅgika turiya paggahīta nānāvidha nāga nāṭakānaṃ majjhahato dhākukaraṇḍaṃ
anya-e1202n0:538_3: maṇicaṅgoṭake ṭhapetvā sīsenādāya mahāsakkāra sammānaṃ karonto nāgabhavanaṃ netvā
anya-e1202n0:538_4: channavuti koṭidhane pūjetvā sabbaratanehi cetiyañca cetiyagharañca māpetvā dhātuyo
anya-e1202n0:538_5: pariharati. Mahākassapatthero ajātasattuno dhātunidhānaṃ karonto rāmagāme dhātuyo
anya-e1202n0:538_6: ṭhapetvā sesa dhātuyo āharitvā adāsi rājā rāmagāme dhātuyo kasmā nāhaṭāti pucchi.
anya-e1202n0:539_0: Thero mahārāja tāsaṃ antarāyo natthi anāgate tambapaṇṇidīpe mahācetiye patiṭṭhahissantīti
anya-e1202n0:539_1: āha. Asoko dhammarājāpi dhātunidhānaṃ ugghāṭetvā olokento aṭṭhamaṃ dhātudoṇaṃ adisvā
anya-e1202n0:539_2: aparaṃ dhātuṃ doṇaṃ kattha bhanteti pucchi mahārāja taṃ koḷiyehi gaṅgātīre kata cetiye
anya-e1202n0:539_3: patiṭṭhitaṃ, mahoghena cetiye bhinne mahāsamuddaṃ pāvisi.
anya-e1202n0:540_0: Taṃ nāgā disvā attano nāgabhavanaṃ netvā pariharantīti khīṇāsavā āhaṃsu rājā nāgabhavanaṃ
anya-e1202n0:540_1: nāma mama āṇāpavattanaṭṭhānaṃ, tampi āharāmi bhanteti āha. Mahārāja tā dhātuyo anāgate
anya-e1202n0:540_2: tambapaṇṇidīpe mahācetiye patiṭṭhahissantiti nivāresuṃ. Tasmā tvaṃ mañcherika nāga
anya-e1202n0:540_3: bhavanaṃ gantvā taṃ pavattiṃ nāga rañño nivedetvā dhātuyo āhara, sve dhātu nidhānaṃ
anya-e1202n0:540_4: bhavissatīti. Soṇuttaro sādhūti sampaṭicchitvā attano pariveṇaṃ agamāsi.
anya-e1202n0:541_0: Rājāpi nagaraṃ antvā nagare bheriṃ carāpesi- sve dhātunidhānaṃ bhavissati nāgarā
anya-e1202n0:541_1: attano attano vibhavānurūpena alaṅkaritvā gaṇdhamālādīni gahetvā mahācetiyaṅgaṇaṃ
anya-e1202n0:541_2: otarantuti. Sakkopi vissakammaṃ āṇāpesi-sve mahācetiye dhātunidhānaṃ bhavissati.
anya-e1202n0:541_3: Sakala tampapaṇṇidīpaṃ alaṅkarohīti. So punadivase ekūnayojanasatikaṃ tambapaṇṇidīpaṃ
anya-e1202n0:541_4: kasīṇamaṇḍalaṃ viya samaṃ katvā rajatapaṭṭasadisaṃ vālukākiṇṇaṃpañcavaṇṇapupphasamākūlaṃ
anya-e1202n0:541_5: katvā samantato puṇṇaghaṭapantiyo ṭhapāpetvā sāṇīhi parikkhipitvā upari celavitānaṃ
anya-e1202n0:541_6: baṇdhitvā pathavitale thalapadumāni ākāse olambaka padumāni dassetvā alaṅkata devasabhaṃ
anya-e1202n0:541_7: viya sajjesi. Mahāsamuddañca sannisinnaṃ pañcavidha padumasañcannaṃ akāsi.
anya-e1202n0:542_0: Dhātu ānubhāvena sakala cakkavāḷaṃ gabbhokkamanābhisambodhikālādisu viya sajjitaṃ
anya-e1202n0:542_1: ahosi nāgarāpa nagara vīthiyo sammajjitvā muttāphala sadisaṃ vālukaṃ okiritvā lājapañcamaka
anya-e1202n0:542_2: pupphāni samokiritvā nānāvirāga dhajapaṭākāyo ussāpetvā suvaṇṇaghaṭa kadalitoraṇa
anya-e1202n0:542_3: mālagaghikādīhi alaṅkaritvā nagaraṃ sajjesu. Rājā nagarassa catusu dvāresu anāthānaṃ
anya-e1202n0:542_4: manussānaṃ paribhotthāya nānāppakāra khādanīya bhojanīya gaṇdhamāla vatthābharaṇa
anya-e1202n0:542_5: pañcavidhi mudhavāsa sahita tāmbulāni ca ṭhapāpesi.
anya-e1202n0:543_0: Atha rājā sabbābharaṇa vibhūsito kumuda pannavaṇṇa catusiṇdhavayutta rathavaramāruyha
anya-e1202n0:543_1: alaṅkataṃ kaṇḍulaṃ hatthiṃ purato katvā suvaṇṇacaṅgoṭakaṃ sīse katvā setacchattassa
anya-e1202n0:543_2: heṭṭhā aṭṭhāsi. Tasmiṃ khaṇe sakkaṃ devarājānaṃ devaccharā viya nānābharaṇavibhūsitā
anya-e1202n0:543_3: devakaññupamā aneka sahassa nāṭakitthiyo ceva dasamahāyodhā ca caturaṅginī senā ca
anya-e1202n0:544_0: Tathā aṭṭhuttara sahassa itthiyo ca puṇṇaghaṭe garahatvā parivāresuṃ. Aṭṭhuttara
anya-e1202n0:544_1: sahassa aṭṭhuttara sarassappamāṇeyeva purisā ceva itthiyo ca pupphasamuggāni daṇḍadīpikā
anya-e1202n0:544_2: nānāvaṇṇa dhaje ca gahetvā parivāresuṃ. Evaṃ rājā mahantena rājānubhāvena naṇdanavanaṃ
anya-e1202n0:544_3: nikkhanta devarājā viya nikkhami. Tadā nānāvidha turiya ghosehi ceva hatthassa ratha
anya-e1202n0:545_0: Tasmiṃ khaṇe soṇuttaro attano pariveṇeyeva nisinno turiya ghosena rañño nikkhantabhāvaṃ
anya-e1202n0:545_1: ñatvā abhiññāpādakaṃ catutthajjhānaṃ samāpajjitvā adhiṭṭhayā pathaviyaṃ nimujjitvā
anya-e1202n0:545_2: mañjerika nāgabhavane mahākāḷānāgarañño purato pāturahosi. Nāgarājā soṇuttaraṃ disvā
anya-e1202n0:545_3: uṭṭhāyāsanā abhivādetvā gaṇdhodakena pāde dhovitvā vaṇṇa gaṇdha sampanna kusumehi
anya-e1202n0:545_4: pūjetvā ekāmantaṃ nisīditvā kuto āgatattha bhanteti pucchi tambapaṇṇi dīpato āgatamhāhi
anya-e1202n0:546_0: Mahārāja tambapaṇṇidīpe duṭṭhagāmaṇi abhaya mahārājā mahā cetiyaṃ kārento dhātuyo
anya-e1202n0:546_1: bhikkhusaṅghassa bhāramakāsi. Mahāvihāre tiṃsamattāni bhikkhusahassāni sannipatitvā
anya-e1202n0:546_2: mahāthūpatthāya ṭhapitadhātuyo mahākāḷa nāga rañño santike ṭhitā, tassa taṃ pavattiṃ
anya-e1202n0:546_3: kathetvā dhātuyo āharāti maṃ pesesuṃ, tasmā idhāgatomhīti āha.
anya-e1202n0:547_0: Taṃ sutvā nāgarājā pabbatena viya ajjhotthaṭo mahantena madāmanassena abhibhūto evaṃ
anya-e1202n0:547_1: cintesi mayaṃ pana imā dhātuyo pūjetvā apāyato muñcitvā sagge nibbattissamāti amaññimha.
anya-e1202n0:547_2: Ayaṃ pana bhikkhu mahiddhiko mahānubhāvo, sace imā dhātuyo imasmiṃ ṭhāne ṭhito bhaveyyuṃ,
anya-e1202n0:547_3: amhe abhibhavitvāpi gaṇhituṃ sakkuṇeyya. Dhātuyo apanetuṃ vaṭṭatīti cintetvā parisaṃ
anya-e1202n0:547_4: olokento parisa pariyante ṭhitaṃ vāsuladattaṃ nāma attano bhāgineyyaṃ disvā tassa
anya-e1202n0:547_5: saññamadāsi so mātulassa adhippāyaṃ ñatvā cetiyagharaṃ gantvā dhātukaraṇḍakaṃ ādāya
anya-e1202n0:554: Bahū devā ca nāgā ca-osariṃsu tahiṃ tadā,
anya-e1202n0:556_0: Tato nāgarājā bhāgineyyena dhātuyo apanītabhāvaṃ ñatvā evamāha- mama santike dhātuyo
anya-e1202n0:556_1: natthi, tumhe idha papañca akatvā sīghaṃ gantvā bhikkhusaṅghassa taṃ pavattiṃ ārocetha
anya-e1202n0:556_2: bhikkhusaṅgho aññato dhātuṃ pariyesissatīti sāmaṇero ādite paṭṭhāya dhātu āgamanaṃ
anya-e1202n0:556_3: vatvā dhātuyo tava santikeyeva, papañcaṃ akatvā dehīti codesi.
anya-e1202n0:557_0: Tato nāgarājā sāmaṇerena mūlamhi gahitabhāvaṃ ñatvā yena kenaci pariyāyena dhātuyo
anya-e1202n0:557_1: adatvāva pesituṃ vaṭṭatīti cintetvā sāmaṇeraṃ dhātugharaṃ netvā cetiyañca cetiyagharañca
anya-e1202n0:557_2: dassesi. Taṃ pana cetiyañca cetiyagharañca sabbaratanamayameva ahosi.
anya-e1202n0:561_0: Dassetvā ca pana cetiyagharato oruyha addhacaṇdakapāsāṇe pavāḷapadumamhi ṭhatvā imassa
anya-e1202n0:561_1: cetiyassa cetiyagharassa ca agghaṃ karohi bhanteti āha sāmaṇero na sakkoma mahārāja
anya-e1202n0:561_2: agghaṃ kātuṃ, sakalepi tambhapaṇṇidīpe ratanāni imaṃ addhacaṇdaka pāsāṇaṃ nāgghatīti āha.
anya-e1202n0:562_0: Nāgarājā evaṃ sante mahāsakkāraṭṭhānato appasakkāraṭṭhānaṃ dhātūnaṃ nayanaṃ ayuttaṃ
anya-e1202n0:562_1: nanu bhikkhūti āha. Sāmaṇero evamāhamahārāja buddhā nāma dhammagarukā, na āmisa garukaṃ,
anya-e1202n0:562_2: tumhesu cakkavāḷappamāṇaṃ ratanagharaṃ māpetvā sabbaratanassa pūretvā dhātuyo pariharantesupi
anya-e1202n0:562_3: ekanāgopi dhammābhisamayaṃ kātuṃ samattho nāma natthi yasmā-
anya-e1202n0:563_2: nessāmi dhātuyo. Dhātunidhānaṃ ajjeva-so hi rājā karissati.
anya-e1202n0:564_0: Tasmā papañcamakaritvā-lahuṃ me dehi dhātuye”ti-āha. Evaṃ vutte nāgarājā appaṭihāno
anya-e1202n0:564_1: yutvā attano bhāgineyyena dhātuyo gopitoti maññamāno evamāha. Tumhe bhante cetiye
anya-e1202n0:564_2: dhātūnaṃ atthibhāvaṃ vā natthibhāvaṃ vā ajānantā dehi dehīti vadatha. Ahaṃ natthīti
anya-e1202n0:564_3: vadāmi. Sace passatha gahetvā gacchathāti. Gaṇhāmi mahārājāti, gaṇha bhikkhūti. Gaṇhāmi
anya-e1202n0:564_4: mahārājāti, gaṇha bhikkhūti tikkhattuṃ paṭiññaṃ gahetvā.
anya-e1202n0:569_0: Tadā sāmaṇerassa nāgena saddhiṃ yuddhaṃ passissāmāti samāgatā deva-nāga parisāpa
anya-e1202n0:569_1: bhikkhunāgassa vijayaṃ disvā haṭṭhā pamodito dhātuyo pūjayantāva teneva saha āgamuṃ,
anya-e1202n0:569_2: nāgarājā sāmaṇerassa gata kāle bhikkhuṃ vañcetvā pesitomhīti haṭṭhatuṭṭho dhātuyo
anya-e1202n0:574: Tato nāgabhavane sabbe nāgā samāgantvā kese muñcitvā ubhohi hatthehi hadaye gahetvā nīluppala sadisehi nettehi vilīna sokamiva assudhāraṃ pavattayamānā-
anya-e1202n0:577_0: Paridevitvā ca bhikkhusaṅghassa evamāhaṃsu- bhante kassaci pīḷaṃ akatvā amhākaṃ puññānubhāvena
anya-e1202n0:577_1: labhitvā cīraparihaṭa dhātuyo kasmā anavasesaṃ katvā aharāpetha amhākaṃ saggamokkhantarāyaṃ karothāti.
anya-e1202n0:580_0: Tato sakko devānamiṇdo vissakammaṃ āmantetvā sāmaṇerassa uṭṭhitaṭṭhāne sattaratanamayaṃ
anya-e1202n0:580_1: maṇḍapaṃ māpehīti āha. So tasmiyeva khaṇe maṇḍapaṃ māpesi atha sakko dvīsu devalokesu
anya-e1202n0:580_2: devaparisāya parivuto suvaṇṇacaṅgoṭakena saddhiṃ ratana pallaṅkamādāya āgantvā tasmiṃ
anya-e1202n0:580_3: maṇḍape patiṭṭhāpetvā sāmaṇerassa hatthato dhātukaraṇḍakaṃ gahetvā tasmiṃ pallaṅke patiṭṭhāpesi. Tadā-
anya-e1202n0:595_0: Tadā iṇdaguttatthero mārassa paṭibāhanatthāya cakkavāḷapariyantaṃ katvā ākāse lohachattaṃ
anya-e1202n0:595_1: māpesi. Pañcanikāyika therā dhātuyo parivāretvā pañcasu ṭhānesu nisīditvā gaṇasajjhāyamakaṃsu.
anya-e1202n0:595_2: Tasmiṃ kāle rājā taṃ ṭhanaṃ āgantvā sisato suvaṇṇa caṅgoṭakaṃ otāretvā dhātu caṅgoṭakaṃ
anya-e1202n0:595_3: attano caṅgoṭake ṭhapetvā pallaṅke patiṭṭhāpetvā gaṇdhamālādīhi pūjetvā pañcapatiṭṭhitena
anya-e1202n0:595_4: vaṇditvā sirasi añjaliṃ paggayha akkhīni ummīletvā olokento aṭṭhāsi. Tasmiṃ khaṇe
anya-e1202n0:595_5: dhātumatthake setacchattaṃ dissati chattagāhaka brahmā na dissati. Tathā tālavaṇṭa
anya-e1202n0:595_6: vijani ādayo dissanti gāhakā na dissanti dibbaturiyaghosa saṅgitiyo suyyanti gaṇdhabba
anya-e1202n0:595_7: devatā na dissanti. Rājā etaṃ acchariyaṃ disvā iṇdaguttattheraṃ evamāha-devatā dibbachattena
anya-e1202n0:595_8: pūjesuṃ ahaṃ mānusa kacchattena pūjemi bhanneti. Thero yuttaṃ mahārājāti āha. Rājā
anya-e1202n0:595_9: attano suvaṇṇapiṇḍike setacchattena pūjetvā suvaṇṇabhiṃkāraṃ gahetvā abhisekodakaṃ
anya-e1202n0:595_10: datvā taṃ divasaṃ sakalatambapaṇṇi dīpe rajjaṃ adāsi.
anya-e1202n0:596_0: Tato sabbaturiyāni paggaṇhiṃsu, gaṇdhamālādīhi pūjetva mahantaṃ sakkāramakaṃsu puna
anya-e1202n0:596_1: rājā theraṃ pucchi - amhākaṃ satthā dibbamānusakāni dve chattāni dhāresi bhante.
anya-e1202n0:596_2: Na dve chattāni tīṇi chattāni mahārājāti. Aññaṃ chattaṃ napassāmi bhanneti. Sīlapatiṭṭhaṃ
anya-e1202n0:596_3: samādhidaṇḍakaṃ iṇdriyasalākaṃ balamālaṃ maggaphalapatta sañchannaṃ vimuttivarasetacchattaṃ
anya-e1202n0:596_4: ussāpetvā ñāṇābhisekampatto dhammaratana cakkaṃ pavattetvā dasasahassa cakkavāḷesu
anya-e1202n0:596_5: buddharajjaṃ hatthagataṃ katvā rajjaṃ kāresīti rājā tīṇicchatta dhārakassa satthuno
anya-e1202n0:596_6: tikkhattuṃ rajjaṃ dammīti tikkhattuṃ dhātuyo rajjena pūjesi.
anya-e1202n0:597_0: Tato rājā devamanussesu dibbagaṇdhamālādīhi pūjentesu anekesu turiyaghosa saṅgitesu
anya-e1202n0:597_1: vattamānesu dhātukaraṇḍakaṃ sīsenādāya ratanamaṇḍapato nikkhamitvā bhikkhusaṅgha
anya-e1202n0:597_2: parivuto mahācetiyaṃ padakkhiṇaṃ katvā pācīnadvārenāruyha dhātugabbhaṃ otari. Tato
anya-e1202n0:597_3: mahācetiyaṃ parivāretvā channavuti koṭippamāṇa arahanto aṭṭhaṃsu.
anya-e1202n0:598_0: Rājā sīsato dhātukaraṇḍakaṃ otāretvā mahārahe sayanapiṭṭhe ṭhapessāmīti cintesi tasmiṃ
anya-e1202n0:598_1: khaṇe dhātukaraṇḍako rañño sīsato satta tālappamāṇe ṭhāne gantvā sayameva vicari
anya-e1202n0:598_2: dhātuyo ākāsamuggantvā dvattiṃsa mahā purisalakkhaṇa asiti anubyañjanā byāmappabhā
anya-e1202n0:598_3: patimaṇḍitaṃ ketumālopa sobhitaṃ nila-pīta-lohitādi bheda vicitra raṃsijālā samujjalaṃ
anya-e1202n0:598_4: buddhavesaṃ gahetvā gaṇḍambamūle yamaka pāṭihāriyaṃ sadisa yamaka pāṭihāriyaṃ akaṃsu.
anya-e1202n0:598_5: Taṃ dhātupāṭihāriyaṃ disvā pasīditvā arahattampattā devamanussā dvādasakoṭiyo ahesuṃ.
anya-e1202n0:598_6: Sesaphalattayaṃ pattā gaṇanapathamatītā ahesuṃ. Evaṃ dhātuyo anekadhā pāṭihāriyaṃ
anya-e1202n0:598_7: dassetvā buddhavesaṃ vissajjetvā karaṇḍakaṃ pavisitvā tena saddhiṃ otaritvā rañño sīse patiṭṭhahiṃsu.
anya-e1202n0:599_0: Rājā amatena viya abhisitto saphalaṃ manussatta paṭilābhaṃ maññamāno ubhohi hatthehi
anya-e1202n0:599_1: dhātukaraṇḍakaṃ gahetvā nāṭaka parivuto alaṅkata sayana samīpaṃ gantvā dhātucaṅgoṭakaṃ
anya-e1202n0:599_2: ratanapallaṅke ṭhapetvā gaṇdhavāsitodakena hatthe dhovitvā vatujātiya gaṇdhena ubbaṭṭetvā
anya-e1202n0:599_3: ratanakaraṇḍakaṃ vicaritvā dhātuyo gahetvā evaṃ cintesi.
anya-e1202n0:601: Janassa saraṇaṃ hutvā yadi ṭhassanti dhātuyo;
anya-e1202n0:604: Evaṃ cintetvā pana varasayanapiṭṭhe dhātuyo ṭhapesi tasmiṃ khaṇe dhātuyo raññā cintita niyāmeneva mahārahe sayane buddhavesena sayiṃsu.
anya-e1202n0:607: Saha dhātu patiṭṭhānā akampittha mahāmahī, pāṭihīrāni nekāni pavattiṃsu anekadhā.”
anya-e1202n0:608_0: Tadahi udakapariyantaṃ katvā ayaṃ mahāpathavī saṅkampi sampakampi sampavedhi, mahāsamuddo
anya-e1202n0:608_1: saṅkhūbhi, ākāse vijjullatā nicchariṃsu. Khaṇikavassaṃ vassi, cha devalokā ekakolāhala
anya-e1202n0:608_2: mahosi rājā etaṃ acchariyaṃ disvā pasanno attano kañcana mālika setacchattena dhātuyo
anya-e1202n0:608_3: pūjetvā tambapaṇṇidipe rajjaṃ sattāhaṃ datvā tiṃsa satasahassagghanakaṃ alaṅkāra
anya-e1202n0:608_4: bhaṇḍaṃ omuñcitvā pūjesi. Tathā sabbāpi nāṭakitthiyo amaccā sesa mahājano devā ca
anya-e1202n0:609: Tiṭṭhantaṃ sugataṃ tilokamahitaṃ yo pūjaye sādaraṃ,
anya-e1202n0:610: Yo vā sāsapa bījamattampi taṃ dhātuṃ naro pūjaye;
anya-e1202n0:611: Tesaṃ puññaphalaṃ samānamīti taṃ cittappasāde same,
anya-e1202n0:612: Ñatvā taṃ parinibbutepi sugate dhātuṃ budho pūjaye’ti;
anya-e1202n0:613_0: Tato rājā cīvaravatthāni ceva guḷa-sappi ādi bhesajjāni ca saṅghassa datvā sabbarattiṃ
anya-e1202n0:613_1: gaṇasajjhāyaṃ kāresi puna divase nagare bheriṃ carāpesi mahājano imaṃ sattāhaṃ gaṇdhamālādīni
anya-e1202n0:613_2: ādiya gantvā dhātuyo vaṇdatūti iṇdaguttattheropi sakala tambapaṇṇi dīpe manussā dhātuyo
anya-e1202n0:613_3: vaṇditukāmā, taṃ khaṇaṃyeva āgantvā vaṇditvā yathāṭṭhānaṃ gacchantūti adhiṭṭhāsi.
anya-e1202n0:614_0: Te tatheva dhātuyo vaṇditvā gamiṃsu rājā sattāhaṃ saṅghassa mahādānaṃ pavattetvā
anya-e1202n0:614_1: sattāhassa accayena dhātugabbhe mayā kattabbakiccaṃ niṭṭhāpitaṃ, dhātugabbhaṃ pidahatha
anya-e1202n0:614_2: bhanteti saṅghassa ārocesi. Saṅgho uttarasumana sāmaṇere āmantetvā tumhehi pubbe
anya-e1202n0:614_3: āhaṭa medavaṇṇa pāsāṇena dhātu gabbhaṃ pidahathāti āha. Te sādhūti sampaṭicchitvā
anya-e1202n0:615_0: Tato khīṇāsavā dhātugabbhe gaṇdhā mā susantu mālā mā milāyantu. Dīpā mā nibbāyantu
anya-e1202n0:615_1: ratanāni mā vivaṇṇāni hontu pūjanīyabhaṇḍāni mā nassantu. Medavaṇṇa pāsāṇā saṇdhiyantu,
anya-e1202n0:616_0: Evaṃ rājā dhātu nidhāpetvā puna nagare bheriṃ carāpesi mahā cetiye dhātuṃ nidhāpetvā
anya-e1202n0:616_1: dhātuṃ āharitvā nidhānaṃ karontūti. Mahājano attano attano balānurūpena suvaṇṇa rajatādi
anya-e1202n0:616_2: karaṇḍe kārāpetvā tattha dhātuyo patiṭṭhāpetvā dhātunidhānassupari medavaṇṇa pāsāṇa
anya-e1202n0:616_3: piṭṭhiyaṃ nidahiṃsu. Sabbehi sannihita dhātuyo sahassamattā ahesunti.
anya-e1202n0:617: Iti sādhujana manopasādanatthāya kate thūpavaṃse dhātunidhāna kathā niṭṭhitā.
anya-e1202n0:618_0: 24. Tato rājā taṃ sabbaṃ pidahetvā cetiyaṃ karonto udarena saddhiṃ caturassa koṭṭhakaṃ
anya-e1202n0:618_1: niṭṭhāpesi atha chattakamme sudhākamme ca aniṭṭhiteyeva māraṇantika rogena gilāno
anya-e1202n0:618_2: hutvā dīghavāpito kaniṭṭhabhātaraṃ pakkosāpetvā cetiye aniṭṭhitaṃ chattakammaṃ sudhākammañca
anya-e1202n0:618_3: sīghaṃ niṭṭhāpetvā maṃ tosehi tātāti āha. So rañño dubbalabhāvaṃ ñatvā antare aniṭṭhitakammaṃ
anya-e1202n0:618_4: kātuṃ na sakkāti suddhavatthehi kañcukaṃ kāretvā cetiye paṭimuñcāpetvā cittakārehi
anya-e1202n0:618_5: kañcuka matthake vedikā ca puṇṇaghaṭa pañcaṅguli pantiyo ca kārāpesi.
anya-e1202n0:619_0: Naḷakārehi veḷumaya chattaṃ kāretvā kharapattamaye caṇdasūriyamaṇḍale muddhani vedikā
anya-e1202n0:619_1: kāretvā lākhākukuṭṭhakehi taṃ vicittaṃ katvā thūpakammaṃ niṭṭhitanti rañño arocesi
anya-e1202n0:619_2: rājā tena hi maṃ mahācetiyaṃ dassehīti vatvā sivikāya nipajjitvā cetiyā padakkhiṇaṃ
anya-e1202n0:619_3: katvā dakkhiṇadvāre bhūmisayanaṃ paññāpetvā tattha nipanno dakkhiṇena passena sayitvā
anya-e1202n0:619_4: mahāthūpaṃ vāmapassena sayitvā lohapāsādaṃ olokento pasanna citto ahosi. Tadā rañño
anya-e1202n0:619_5: sāsanassa bahūpakārabhāvaṃ sallakkhetvā gilāna pucchanatthāya tato tato āgatā bhikkhu
anya-e1202n0:619_6: channavuti koṭiyo rājānaṃ parivāretvā aṭṭhaṃsu. Tato saṅgho vagga vaggā hutvā gaṇasajjhāyaṃ akāsi.
anya-e1202n0:620_0: Rājā tasmiṃ samāgame theraputtābhayattheraṃ adisvā evaṃ cintesi. So mayi damiḷehi
anya-e1202n0:620_1: saddhiṃ aṭṭhavīsati mahāyuddhe kayiramāse apaccosakakitvā idāni maraṇayuddhe vattamāṇe
anya-e1202n0:620_2: mayhaṃ parājayaṃ disvā maññe nāgacchatīti. Tadā thero kariṇda nadī sīse pajjalita
anya-e1202n0:620_3: pabbate vasanto rañño parivitakkaṃ ñatvā pañcasata khīṇāsava parivusetā ākāsenāgantvā
anya-e1202n0:621_0: Rājā theraṃ disvā attano purato nisīdāpetvā evamāha bhante tumhehi saddhiṃ dasamahā
anya-e1202n0:621_1: yodhe gahetvā damiḷehi saddhi yujdhiṃ. Idāni ekakova maccūnā saddhiṃ yujjhituṃ ārabhiṃ.
anya-e1202n0:621_2: Maccu sattumpana parājetuṃ na sakkomīti. Tato-
anya-e1202n0:624: Iti vatvā evaṃ anusāsi. Mahārāja sabboyeva loka sannivāse jātiyā anugato, jarāya anusaṭo, vyādhinā abhibhūto, maraṇena abbhāhato. Tetāha-
anya-e1202n0:627: Evaṃ jarā ca maccu ca-adhivattanti pāṇino,
anya-e1202n0:628: Khattiyo brāhmaṇe vesse sudde caṇḍāla pukkuse,
anya-e1202n0:630: Na tattha hatthinaṃ bhūmi-na rathānaṃ na pattiyā,
anya-e1202n0:631: Na cāpi mantayuddhena-sakkā jetuṃ dhanena vā”ti;
anya-e1202n0:632_0: Tasmā idaṃ maraṇaṃ nāma mahāyasānaṃ mahāsammatādīnaṃ mahā puññānaṃ jotiyādīnaṃ mahāthāmānaṃ
anya-e1202n0:632_1: baladevādīnaṃ iddhimantānaṃ mahāmoggallānādīnaṃ paññāvantānaṃ sāriputtādīnaṃ sayambhūñāṇena
anya-e1202n0:632_2: adhigata saccānaṃ, paccekabuddhānaṃ sabbaguṇasamannāgatānaṃ sammāsambuddhānampi upari
anya-e1202n0:634: Mahāyasā rājavarā gatā te sabbe mahāsammata ādayopi,
anya-e1202n0:635: Aniccabhāvaṃ baladeva ādi mahābalā ceva tathā gamiṃsu;
anya-e1202n0:636: Ye puññavantāni gatā pasiddhiṃ mahaddhanaṃ jotiyameṇḍakādī,
anya-e1202n0:637: Upāvisiṃ vaccumukhaṃ sabhogā sabbepi te rāhumukhaṃ sasīva;
anya-e1202n0:638: Yo iddhimantesu tathāgatassa puttesuseṭṭho iti vissutopi,
anya-e1202n0:639: Thero mahārājasaheva iddhibalena so maccumukhaṃ paviṭṭho;
anya-e1202n0:640: Sabbesu sattesu jinaṃ ṭhapetvā nevatthi paññāya samopi yena,
anya-e1202n0:641: So dhammasenāpati sāvakopi gato mahārāja aniccataṃ’ca;
anya-e1202n0:642: Sayambhūñāṇassa balena santiṃ gatā mahārāja sayambhūnopi,
anya-e1202n0:643: Sabbepi te ñāṇabalūpa pannā aniccataṃ neva atikkamiṃsu;
anya-e1202n0:645: Nāsakkhi gantuṃ sugatopi rāja aññesu sattesu kathāva natthi;
anya-e1202n0:646: Tasmā mahārāja bhavesu sattā sabbepi nāsuṃ maraṇā vimuttā,
anya-e1202n0:647: Sabbampi saṅkhāragataṃ aniccaṃ dūkkhaṃ anattāti vicintayassu;
anya-e1202n0:650: Idhāgamma bahuṃ puññaṃ akāsi ca anekadhā,
anya-e1202n0:652: Mahā rāja kataṃ puññaṃ yāvajja divasā tayā,
anya-e1202n0:654: Taṃ sutvā tuṭṭhamānaso rājā bhante tumhe maccuyuddhepi apassayāti vatvā laddhassāso puññapotthakaṃ vācetuṃ āṇāpesi lekhako puññapotthakaṃ evaṃ vācesi.
anya-e1202n0:669_0: 25. Taṃ sutvā rājā tussitvā ṭhapehi ṭhapehi bhaṇeti vatvā evamāha. Maricavaṭṭi vihāramahasattāhe
anya-e1202n0:669_1: thūpāramhasattāhe ca cātuddisa ubhato saṅghassa mahārahaṃ mahādānaṃ pavattesiṃ. Catuvīsati
anya-e1202n0:669_2: mahāvisākhapūjā kāresiṃ tambapaṇṇidīpe mahābhikkhusaṅghassa tikkhattuṃ cīvaramadāsiṃ
anya-e1202n0:669_3: satta satta dīnāni laṅkā rajjaṃ sāsanassa pañcakkhattuṃ adāsiṃ sappi sannitta suparisuddha
anya-e1202n0:669_4: vaṭṭiyā dvādasaṭhānesu, sattaṃ dīpasahassaṃ jālesiṃ aṭṭhārassu ṭhānesu gilānānaṃ
anya-e1202n0:669_5: vejjehi bhesajjañca bhattañca niccaṃ dāpesi. Catucattālīsa ṭhānesu telullopakañca
anya-e1202n0:669_6: adāsiṃ. Tattakesuyeva ṭhānesu ghatapakkajālapūve bhattena saddhiṃ niccaṃ dāpesiṃ.
anya-e1202n0:670_0: Māse māse aṭṭhasu uposathadivasesu laṅkādīpe sabbavihāresu dīpatelaṃ dāpesiṃ. Āmisa
anya-e1202n0:670_1: dānato dhammadānaṃ mahantanti sutvā heṭṭhaṃ lohapāsāde dhammāsane nisīditvā maṅgala
anya-e1202n0:670_2: suttaṃ osāretuṃ ārabhitvāpi saṅgha gāravena osāretuṃ nāsakkhiṃ. Tato paṭṭhāya dhammadesake
anya-e1202n0:670_3: sakkaritvā sabbavihāresu dhammakathaṃ kathāpesiṃ ekekassa dhammakathikassa nāḷa nāḷippamāṇāni
anya-e1202n0:670_4: sappiphāṇita sakkharāni caturaṅgula muṭṭhippamāṇaṃ yaṭṭhimadhukaṃ sāṭakadvayañca
anya-e1202n0:670_5: māsassa aṭṭhasu uposatha disesu dāpesiṃ. Etaṃ sabbampi issariye ṭhatvā dinnattā mama
anya-e1202n0:670_6: cittaṃ sa ārādheti. Jīvitaṃ pana anapekkhitvā duggatena mayā dinnadānadvayameva ārādhetīti.
anya-e1202n0:671_0: Taṃ sutvā abhayatthero mahārāja pasādanīyaṭṭhāneyeva pasādaṃ akāsi taṃ pana piṇḍapātadvayaṃ
anya-e1202n0:671_1: parissa pīḷaṃ akatvā laddha dhammika paccayattā attānaṃ anavaloketvā asajjamānena
anya-e1202n0:671_2: dinnattā paṭiggāhakānaṃ yāvadatthaṃ katvā dinnattā pītipāmojjaṃjanayitvā balava saddhāya
anya-e1202n0:671_3: dinnattā deyyadhammassa niravasesaṃ paribhogaṃ gatattāti imehi pañcahi kāraṇehi mahantatti
anya-e1202n0:671_4: vatvā mahārāja kaṅgu ambili piṇḍagāhakattheresu maliyamahādevatthero samantakūṭe
anya-e1202n0:671_5: pañcannaṃ bhikkhusatānaṃ datvā paribhuñji pathavi cālanaka dhammaguttatthero kalyāṇīya
anya-e1202n0:672_0: Talaṅgaravāsī dhammaguttattheropi piyaṅgudīpe dvādasannaṃ bhikkhusahassānaṃ datvā
anya-e1202n0:672_1: paribhuñji. Maṅgaṇavāsī cuḷatissatthero kelāsakūṭe vihāre saṭṭhisahassānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ
anya-e1202n0:672_2: datvā paribhuñji mahābhaggattheropi ukkānagara vihāre sattasatānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ datvā
anya-e1202n0:672_3: paribhuñji saraka bhattagāhakatthero pana piyaṅgudīpe dvādasannaṃ bhikkhusahassānaṃ
anya-e1202n0:672_4: datvā paribhogamakāsīti vatvā rañño cittaṃ hāsesi.
anya-e1202n0:673_0: Rājā cittaṃ pasādetvā evamāha-ahambhante catuvīsati vassāni rajjaṃ kārento bhikkhusaṅghassa
anya-e1202n0:673_1: pahūpakāro ahosiṃ. Kāyopi me saṅghassa upakārako hotu saṅghadāsassa me sarīraṃ mahācetiyassa
anya-e1202n0:673_2: dassanaṭṭhāne saṅghassa kammamālake jhāpethāti. Tato kaniṭṭhaṃ āmantetvā’tāta! Tissa!
anya-e1202n0:673_3: Mahāthūpe aniṭṭhitaṃ kammaṃ sādhukaṃ niṭṭhāpesi. Sāyaṃ pāto ca mahāthūpe pupphapūjaṃ
anya-e1202n0:673_4: kāretvā tikkhattuṃ upahāraṃ kārehi. Mayā ṭhapitaṃ dānavaṭṭaṃ sabbaṃ aparihāpetvā
anya-e1202n0:673_5: saṅghassa kattabbakiccesu sadā appamatto hohī’ti anusāyitvā tuṇhi ahosi.
anya-e1202n0:674_0: Tasmiṃ khaṇe bhikkhu gaṇasajjhāyaṃ ārabhiṃsu devatā pana chadeva lokato cha rathe
anya-e1202n0:674_1: gahetvā ādāya paṭipāṭiyā ṭhapetvā mahārāja amhākaṃ devaloko ramaṇīyo, amhākaṃ devaloko
anya-e1202n0:674_2: ramaṇīyoti vatvā attano attano devalokaṃ āgamanatthāya yāciṃsu rājā tesaṃ vacanaṃ
anya-e1202n0:674_3: sutvā yāvāhaṃ dhammaṃ suṇāmi- tāva adhivāsethāti te hatthasaññāya nivāresi saṅgho
anya-e1202n0:675_0: Rājā kasmā bhante gaṇasajjhāyaṃ ṭhapethāti āha. Mahārāja tayā hatthasaññāya nivāritattāti.
anya-e1202n0:675_1: Bhante tumhākaṃ saññaṃ nādāsiṃ. Devatā chadevalokato cha rathe ānetvā attano attano
anya-e1202n0:675_2: devalokaṃ gantuṃ yācanti tasmā tesaṃ yāvāhaṃ dhammaṃ suṇāmi tāva āgamethāti saññaṃ
anya-e1202n0:675_3: adāsinti taṃ sutvā keci ayaṃ rājā maraṇabhayabhito vippalapati, maraṇato abhāyanaka
anya-e1202n0:676_0: Tato abhayatthero āha kathaṃ mahārāja saddahituṃ sakkā cha devalokato cha rathā ānītāti
anya-e1202n0:676_1: taṃ sutvā rājā ākāse pupphadāmāni khipāpesi. Tāni gantvā visuṃ rathadhure olambiṃsu
anya-e1202n0:676_2: mahājano ākāse olambantāni pupphadāmāni disvā nikkaṅkho ahosi.
anya-e1202n0:677_0: Tato rājā theraṃ pucchi-katamo pana bhante devaloko ramaṇīyoti. Tusitabhavanaṃ pana
anya-e1202n0:677_1: mahārāja ramaṇīyaṃ, buddhabhāvāya samayaṃ olokento metteyyo bodhisattopi tasmiṃyeva vasatīti āha.
anya-e1202n0:678_0: Taṃ sutvā rājā tasmiṃ ālayaṃ katvā mahāthūpaṃ olokento nipannova cavitvā suttappabuddho
anya-e1202n0:678_1: viya tusita bhavanato āhaṭa. Rathe nibbattitvā attano katapuññassa thalaṃ mahājanassa
anya-e1202n0:678_2: pākaṭaṃ kātuṃ ratheyeva ṭhatvā dibbābharaṇa vibhūsito mahājanassa passantasseva tikkhattuṃ
anya-e1202n0:678_3: mahāthūpaṃ padakkhiṇaṃ katvā bhikkhusaṅghañca vaṇditvā tusitabhavanaṃ agamāsi.
anya-e1202n0:679: Evaṃ asāre nicaye dhanānaṃ aniccasaṅghaṃ sattaṃ sapaññā,
anya-e1202n0:680: Katvana cāgaṃ ratanattayamahi ādāya sāraṃ sugatiṃ vajanti;
anya-e1202n0:681_0: Rañño nāṭakatthiyo matabhāvaṃ ñatvā yattha ṭhitā makuḷaṃ mocayiṃsu tatthaṃ ṭhāne
anya-e1202n0:681_1: katasālā makuḷamuttasālānāmajātā. Rañño sarīrasmiṃ citakaṃ āropite yattha mahājano
anya-e1202n0:681_2: hatthe paggahetvā viraci. Tattha katasālā viracitthasālā nāma jātā. Rañño sarīraṃ
anya-e1202n0:681_3: yattha jhāpesuṃ - so sīmāmālako rājamālako nāma jāto. Atha rañño kaniṭṭhabhātā saddhātissamahārājā
anya-e1202n0:681_4: nāma hutvā cetiye aniṭṭhataṃ jattakammaṃ sudhākammañca niṭṭhāpetvā thūpamakāsīti
anya-e1202n0:682: Iti sādhujana manopasādanatthāya kate thūpavaṃse mahācetiye katā niṭṭhitā.
anya-e1202n0:683_0: 26. Etarahi duṭṭhagāmaṇi abhaya mahārājassa pitā kākavaṇṇatissa rājā metteyyassa
anya-e1202n0:683_1: bhagavato pitā bhavissati. Vihāramahādevī mātā bhavissati. Duṭṭhagāmiṇi abhayo aggasāvako
anya-e1202n0:683_2: bhavissati. Kaniṭṭho dutiya sāvako bhavisasati. Rañño pitucchā anuḷādevī aggamahesī
anya-e1202n0:683_3: bhavissati. Rañño putto sāli rājakumāro putto bhavissati. Bhaṇḍāgārika saṅghāmacco
anya-e1202n0:683_4: aggupaṭṭhāko bhavissati tassāmaccassa dhītā aggupaṭṭhāyikā bhavissatīti evaṃ sabbepi
anya-e1202n0:683_5: katādhikārā hetu sampannā tassa bhagavato dhammaṃ sutvā dukkhassantaṃ karitvā anupādisesāya
anya-e1202n0:692: Yaṃ pattaṃ kusalaṃ kammaṃ karontena imaṃ mayaṃ,
anya-e1202n0:693: Tena etena puññena sattā gacchantu nibbutiṃ;
anya-e1202n0:701: Dhīmatā sukatā yena suṭṭhu sīhaḷa bhāsato
